## <a name="azure-sas"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-874">Azure SA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-874">Azure SAS</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-875">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-875">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-876">字符串 "sig"，后跟下面模式中所示的字符和字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-876">The string "sig" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-877">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-877">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-878">字符串 "sig"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-878">the string "sig"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-879">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-879">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-880">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-880">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-881">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-881">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-882">介于43-53 个字符和小写字母、数字或百分号 (% ) 之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-882">any combination of between 43-53 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, or the percent sign (%)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-883">字符串 "% 3d"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-883">the string "%3d"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-884">不是字母或数字的小写字母、数字或百分号 (% ) 的任意字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-884">any character that is not a lower- or uppercase letter, digit, or percent sign (%)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-885">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-885">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-886">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-886">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-887">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-887">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-888">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-888">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-889">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_AzureSAS 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-889">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureSAS finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure SAS-->
<Entity id="4d235014-e564-47f4-a6fb-6ebb4a826834" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureSAS" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-service-bus-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-890">Azure 服务总线连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-890">Azure service bus connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-891">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-891">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-892">字符串 "终结点"，后跟下面模式中所示的字符和字符串，包括字符串 "</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-892">The string "EndPoint" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-893">net "和" SharedAccesKey "。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-893">net" and "SharedAccesKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-894">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-894">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-895">字符串 "EndPoint"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-895">the string "EndPoint"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-896">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-896">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-897">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-897">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-898">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-898">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-899">介于1-200 个字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-899">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-900">字符串 "</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-900">the string "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-901">netmeeting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-901">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-902">介于1-200 个字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-902">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-903">字符串 "SharedAccessKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-903">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-904">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-904">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-905">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-905">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-906">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-906">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-907">43个字符的任意组合，这些字符为小写字母、数字、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-907">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-908">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-908">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-909">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-909">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-910">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-910">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-911">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-911">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-912">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-912">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-913">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString 找到与该模式匹配的内容。。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-913">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-914">正则表达式 **CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-914">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Service Bus Connection String-->
<Entity id="b9a6578f-a83f-4fcd-bf44-2130bae49a6f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-929">Azure 存储帐户密钥</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-929">Azure storage account key</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-931">字符串 "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"，后跟下面模式中所述的字符和字符串，包括字符串 "AccountKey"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-931">The string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "AccountKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-932">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-932">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-933">字符串 "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-933">the string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-934">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-934">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-935">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-935">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-936">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-936">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-937">介于1-200 个字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-937">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-938">字符串 "AccountKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-938">the string "AccountKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-939">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-939">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-940">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-940">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-941">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-941">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-942">86个字符的任意组合，这些字符为小写字母、数字、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-942">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-943">两个等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-943">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-944">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-944">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-945">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-945">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-946">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-946">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-947">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-947">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-948">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-948">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-949">正则表达式 **CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-949">The regular expression CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-950">正则表达式 **CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-950">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key-->
<Entity id="c7bc98e8-551a-4c35-a92d-d2c8cda714a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key-generic"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-968"> (通用) 的 Azure 存储帐户密钥</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-968">Azure Storage account key (generic)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-969">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-969">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-970">86的任意组合（以小写或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) ，在下面的模式中所列字符的前面或后面）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-970">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+), preceded or followed by the characters outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-971">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-971">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-972">0到大于号之一 ( # A0) 、撇号 ( ' ) 、等号 (=) 、引号 ( ") 或数字标记 ( # ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-972">zero to one of the greater than symbol (>), apostrophe ('), equal sign (=), quotation mark ("), or number sign (#)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-973">86个字符的任意组合，这些字符为小写字母、数字、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-973">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-974">两个等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-974">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-975">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-975">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-976">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-976">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-977">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-977">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-978">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-978">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-979">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-979">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key (Generic)-->
<Entity id="7ff41bd0-5419-4523-91d6-383b3a37f084" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
## <a name="belgium-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-980">比利时驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-980">Belgium driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-981">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-981">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-982">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-982">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-983">10个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-983">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-984">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-984">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-985">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-985">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-986">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-986">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-987">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-987">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-988">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-988">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-989">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-989">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-990">正则表达式  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-990">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-991">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-991">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-national-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1013">比利时国家/地区号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1013">Belgium national number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1014">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1014">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1015">11位数加上可选分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1015">11 digits plus optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1016">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1016">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1017">11 个数字加分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1017">11 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1018">6个数字和两个可选句点（以 YY 为格式）。月.DD 出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1018">six digits and two optional periods in the format YY.MM.DD for date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1019">点、短划线、空间中的可选分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1019">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1020">奇数的三个连续数字 (奇数，即使偶数) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1020">three sequential digits (odd for males, even for females)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1021">点、短划线、空间中的可选分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1021">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1022">两个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1022">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1023">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1023">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1024">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1024">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1025">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1025">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1026">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1026">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1027">函数 Func_belgium_national_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1027">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1028">找到 Keyword_belgium_national_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1028">A keyword from Keyword_belgium_national_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1029">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1029">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1030">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1030">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1031">函数 Func_belgium_national_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1031">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1032">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1032">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Belgium National Number -->
       <Entity id="fb969c9e-0fd1-4b18-8091-a2123c5e6a54" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1091">比利时护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1091">Belgium passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1092">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1092">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1093">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1093">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1094">两个字母后跟六个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1094">two letters followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1095">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1095">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1096">两个字母，后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1096">two letters and followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1097">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1097">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1098">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1098">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1099">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1099">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1100">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1100">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1101">正则表达式  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1101">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1102">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1102">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1126">比利时社会安全号码或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1126">Belgium social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1127">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号码或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1127">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1128">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1128">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1129">11位数，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1129">11 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1130">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1130">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1131">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1131">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1132">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1132">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1133">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1133">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1134">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1134">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1135">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1135">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1136">函数  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1136">The function  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1137">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1137">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1138">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1138">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1139">函数  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1139">The function  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1159">比利时增值税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1159">Belgium value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1160">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1160">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1161">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1161">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1162">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1162">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1163">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1163">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1164">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1164">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1165">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1165">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1166">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1166">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1167">12个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1167">12-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1168">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1168">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1169">12个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1169">12-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1170">字母 B 或 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1170">a letter B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1171">字母 E 或 E</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1171">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1172">数字0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1172">a digit 0</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1173">一个从1到9的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1173">a digit from 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1174">一个可选的点或连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1174">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1175">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1175">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1176">一个可选的点或连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1176">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1177">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1177">four digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1178">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1178">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1179">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1179">Yes</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1180">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1180">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1181">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1181">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1182">函数 Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1182">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1183">找到 Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1183">A keyword from Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1184">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1184">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1185">函数 Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1185">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="85b5b3c3-f2de-4ae8-ac46-fd3cb38bf9ed" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1186">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1186">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1187">Keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1187">Keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

## <a name="brazil-cpf-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1197">巴西 CPF 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1197">Brazil CPF number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1198">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1198">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1199">11 个数字（包括校验位），可以格式化，也可以非格式化</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1199">11 digits that include a check digit and can be formatted or unformatted</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1200">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1200">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1201">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1201">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1202">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1202">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1203">一个句点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1203">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1204">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1204">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1205">一个句点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1205">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1206">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1206">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1207">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1207">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1208">两个数字，是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1208">two digits which are check digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1209">纯</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1209">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1210">11 个数字，其中最后两个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1210">11 digits where the last two digits are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1211">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1211">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1212">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1212">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1213">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1213">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1214">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1214">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1215">函数 Func_brazil_cpf 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1215">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1216">找到 Keyword_brazil_cpf 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1216">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cpf is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1217">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1217">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1218">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1218">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1219">函数 Func_brazil_cpf 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1219">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1220">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1220">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil CPF Number -->
<Entity id="78e09124-f2c3-4656-b32a-c1a132cd2711" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-legal-entity-number-cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1232">巴西法人编号 (CNPJ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1232">Brazil legal entity number (CNPJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1233">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1233">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1234">14 个数字（包括注册号、分行号码和校验位），再加上分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1234">14 digits that include a registration number, branch number, and check digits, plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1235">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1235">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1236">14 个数字，再加上分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1236">14 digits, plus delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1237">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1237">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1238">一个句点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1238">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1239">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1239">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1240">一个句点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1240">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1241">三个数字 (这些前八位数字是注册号码) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1241">three digits (these first eight digits are the registration number)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1242">一个正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1242">a forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1243">四位数的分支号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1243">four-digit branch number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1244">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1244">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1245">两个数字，是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1245">two digits which are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1246">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1246">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1247">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1247">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1248">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1248">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1249">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1249">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1250">函数 Func_brazil_cnpj 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1250">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1251">找到 Keyword_brazil_cnpj 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1251">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cnpj is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1252">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1252">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1253">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1253">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1254">函数 Func_brazil_cnpj 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1254">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1255">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1255">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil Legal Entity Number (CNPJ) -->
<Entity id="9b58b5cd-5e90-4df6-b34f-1ebcc88ceae4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1268">CNPJ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1268">CNPJ</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1269">Cadastro Nacional da Pessoa Jurídica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1269">Cadastro Nacional da Pessoa Jurídica</span></span>

## <a name="brazil-national-identification-card-rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1277">巴西国家标识卡 (RG) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1277">Brazil national identification card (RG)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1278">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1278">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1279">Registro Geral (旧格式) ：9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1279">Registro Geral (old format): Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1280">Registro de Identidade (RIC)  (新格式) ：11个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1280">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format): 11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1281">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1281">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1282">Registro Geral（旧格式）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1282">Registro Geral (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1283">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1283">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1284">一个句点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1284">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1285">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1285">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1286">一个句点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1286">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1287">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1287">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1288">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1288">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1289">一个数字，是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1289">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1290">Registro de Identidade (RIC)  (新格式) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1290">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1291">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1291">ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1292">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1292">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1293">一个数字，是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1293">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1294">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1294">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1295">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1295">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1296">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1296">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1297">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1297">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1298">函数 Func_brazil_rg 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1298">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1299">找到 Keyword_brazil_rg 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1299">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_rg is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1300">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1300">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1301">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1301">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1302">函数 Func_brazil_rg 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1302">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1303">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1303">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil National ID Card (RG) -->
<Entity id="486de900-db70-41b3-a886-abdf25af119c" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1304">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1304">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1305">Keyword_brazil_rg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1305">Keyword_brazil_rg</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1306">Cédula de identidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1306">Cédula de identidade</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1307">identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1307">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1308">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1308">national id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1309">número de rregistro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1309">número de rregistro</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1310">registro de Iidentidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1310">registro de Iidentidade</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1312">RG（此关键字区分大小写）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1312">RG (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1313">RIC（此关键字区分大小写）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1313">RIC (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span> 


## <a name="bulgaria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1314">保加利亚驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1314">Bulgaria driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1315">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1315">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1316">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1316">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1317">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1317">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1318">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1318">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1319">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1319">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1320">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1320">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1321">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1321">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1322">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1322">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1323">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1323">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1324">正则表达式  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1324">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1325">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1325">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
             <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern> 
</Entity>    
```

## <a name="bulgaria-uniform-civil-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1344">保加利亚统一民事号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1344">Bulgaria uniform civil number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1345">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1345">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1346">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1346">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1347">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1347">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1348">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1348">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1349">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1349">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1350">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1350">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1351">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1351">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1352">10个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1352">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1353">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1353">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1354">10个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1354">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1355">与出生日期 (YYMMDD) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1355">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1356">与出生顺序对应的两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1356">two digits that correspond to the birth order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1357">与性别对应的一位数字：男的偶数位和用于女的奇数位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1357">one digit that corresponds to gender: An even digit for male and an odd digit for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1358">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1358">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1359">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1359">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1360">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1360">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1361">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1361">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1362">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1362">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1363">函数  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1363">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1364">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1364">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1365">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1365">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1366">函数  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1366">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Uniform Civil Number -->
      <Entity id="100d58b1-0a35-4fb1-aa89-e4a86fb53fcc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1411">保加利亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1411">Bulgaria passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1412">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1412">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1413">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1413">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1414">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1414">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1415">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1415">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1416">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1416">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1417">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1417">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1418">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1418">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1419">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1419">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1420">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1420">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1421">正则表达式  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1421">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1422">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1422">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common`is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1423">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1423">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number_common"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1424">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1424">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1425">登记卡#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1425">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1426">登记卡#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1426">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1427">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1427">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1428">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1428">passports</span></span>

## <a name="canada-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1439">加拿大银行帐户号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1439">Canada bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1440">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1440">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1441">七个或十二个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1441">seven or twelve digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1442">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1442">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1443">加拿大银行帐号是七个或十二个数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1443">A Canada Bank Account Number is seven or twelve digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1444">加拿大银行帐户的银行代号是：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1444">A Canada bank account transit number is:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1445">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1445">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1446">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1446">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1447">三位数字或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1447">three digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1448">零 "0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1448">a zero "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1449">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1449">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1450">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1450">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1451">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1451">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1452">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1452">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1453">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1453">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1454">正则表达式 Regex_canada_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1454">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1455">找到 Keyword_canada_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1455">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1456">正则表达式 Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1456">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1457">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1457">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1458">正则表达式 Regex_canada_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1458">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1459">找到 Keyword_canada_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1459">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="552e814c-cb50-4d94-bbaa-bb1d1ffb34de" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number" />
   </Pattern>
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1483">加拿大驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1483">Canada driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1484">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1484">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1485">因省而异</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1485">Varies by province</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1486">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1486">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1487">各种模式，涵盖艾伯塔、 不列颠哥伦比亚、 马尼托巴、 新不伦瑞克、 纽芬兰/拉布拉多、 新斯科舍、 安大略、 爱德华王子岛，魁北克和萨斯喀彻温</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1487">Various patterns covering Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Scotia, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Quebec, and Saskatchewan</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1488">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1488">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1489">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1489">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1490">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1490">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1491">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1491">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1492">函数 Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1492">The function Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1493">找到 Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1493">A keyword from Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1494">找到 Keyword_canada_drivers_license 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1494">A keyword from Keyword_canada_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="37186abb-8e48-4800-ad3c-e3d1610b3db0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_alberta_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_alberta_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_british_columbia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_british_columbia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_manitoba_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_manitoba_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_brunswick_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_brunswick_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_nova_scotia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_nova_scotia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ontario_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ontario_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_quebec_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_quebec_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_saskatchewan_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_saskatchewan_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1630">加拿大运行状况服务号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1630">Canada health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1631">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1631">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1632">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1632">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1633">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1633">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1634">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1634">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1635">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1635">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1636">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1636">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1637">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1637">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1638">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1638">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1639">正则表达式 Regex_canada_health_service_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1639">The regular expression Regex_canada_health_service_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1640">找到 Keyword_canada_health_service_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1640">A keyword from Keyword_canada_health_service_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Health Service Number -->
<Entity id="59c0bf39-7fab-482c-af25-00faa4384c94" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_health_service_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_health_service_number" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1641">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1641">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_canada_health_service_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1642">Keyword_canada_health_service_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1642">Keyword_canada_health_service_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1643">personal health number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1643">personal health number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1644">patient information</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1644">patient information</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1645">health services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1645">health services</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1646">speciality services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1646">speciality services</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1647">automobile accident</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1647">automobile accident</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1648">patient hospital</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1648">patient hospital</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1649">psychiatrist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1649">psychiatrist</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1650">workers compensation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1650">workers compensation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1651">障碍</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1651">disability</span></span>

      
## <a name="canada-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1652">加拿大护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1652">Canada passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1653">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1653">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1654">两个大写字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1654">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1655">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1655">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1656">两个大写字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1656">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1657">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1657">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1658">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1658">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1659">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1659">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1660">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1660">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1661">正则表达式 Regex_canada_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1661">The regular expression Regex_canada_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1662">找到 Keyword_canada_passport_number 或 Keyword_passport 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1662">A keyword from Keyword_canada_passport_number or Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml 
<!-- Canada Passport Number -->
<Entity id="14d0db8b-498a-43ed-9fca-f6097ae687eb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
        </Any>
```

## <a name="canada-personal-health-identification-number-phin"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1692">加拿大个人健康标识号 (PHIN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1692">Canada personal health identification number (PHIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1693">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1693">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1694">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1694">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1695">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1695">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1696">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1696">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1697">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1697">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1698">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1698">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1699">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1699">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1700">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1700">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1701">正则表达式 Regex_canada_phin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1701">The regular expression Regex_canada_phin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-1702">找到 Keyword_canada_phin 或 Keyword_canada_provinces 中至少有两个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-1702">At least two keywords from Keyword_canada_phin or Keyword_canada_provinces are found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada PHIN -->
<Entity id="722e12ac-c89a-4ec8-a1b7-fea3469f89db" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_phin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_phin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_provinces" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
