## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2779">药品实施代理 (DEA) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2779">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2780">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2780">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2781">两个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2781">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2782">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2782">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2783">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2783">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2784">一个字母 (不区分大小写) 这组可能的字母： abcdefghjklmnprstux，这是注册人代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2784">one letter (not case sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2785">一个字母 (不区分大小写) （注册人姓氏的第一个字母）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2785">one letter (not case sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2786">七位数字，最后一个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2786">seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2787">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2787">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2788">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2788">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2789">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2789">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2790">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2790">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2791">函数 Func_dea_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2791">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2792">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2792">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- DEA Number -->
<Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2793">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2793">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2794">无</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2794">none</span></span>


## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2795">爱沙尼亚驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2795">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2796">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2796">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2797">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2797">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2798">两个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2798">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2799">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2799">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2800">两个字母和六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2800">two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2801">字母 "ET" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2801">the letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2802">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2802">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2803">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2803">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2804">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2804">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2805">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2805">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2806">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2806">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2807">正则表达式  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2807">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2808">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2808">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2809">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2809">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_estonia_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2810">Keywords_estonia_eu_driver "s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2810">Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2811">通讯#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2811">dl#</span></span>

## <a name="estonia-personal-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2824">爱沙尼亚个人标识代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2824">Estonia Personal Identification Code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2825">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2825">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2826">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2826">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2827">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2827">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2828">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2828">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2829">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2829">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2830">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2830">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2831">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2831">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2832">11个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2832">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2833">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2833">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2834">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2834">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2835">一种数字，对应于性别和出生世纪 (奇数号码男，甚至是女号码，等等。1-2：19世纪;3-4：20世纪;5-6：21世纪) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2835">one digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2836">6位数字，对应于出生日期 (YYMMDD) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2836">six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2837">三个数字，对应于将出生在同一日期的人员组成的序列号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2837">three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2838">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2838">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2839">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2839">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2840">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2840">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2841">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2841">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2842">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2842">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2843">函数  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2843">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2844">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2844">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2845">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2845">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2846">函数  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2846">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Personal Identification Code -->
      <Entity id="bfb26de6-dad5-4d48-ab72-4789cdd0654c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2879">爱沙尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2879">Estonia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2880">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2880">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2881">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2881">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2882">一个字母后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2882">one letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2883">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2883">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2884">一个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2884">one letter followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2885">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2885">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2886">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2886">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2887">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2887">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2888">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2888">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2889">正则表达式  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2889">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2890">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2890">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2905">EU 借记卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2905">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2906">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2906">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2907">16 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2907">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2908">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2908">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2909">非常复杂且强大的模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2909">Very complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2910">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2910">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2911">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2911">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2912">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2912">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2913">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2913">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2914">函数 Func_eu_debit_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2914">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2915">下列至少其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2915">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2916">找到 Keyword_eu_debit_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2916">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2917">找到 Keyword_card_terms_dict 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2917">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2918">找到 Keyword_card_security_terms_dict 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2918">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2919">找到 Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2919">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2920">函数 Func_expiration_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2920">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-2921">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-2921">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3367">芬兰驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3367">Finland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3368">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3368">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3369">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3369">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3370">10个数字，包含连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3370">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3371">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3371">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3372">10位数，包含连字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3372">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3373">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3373">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3374">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3374">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3375">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3375">four digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3376">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3376">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3377">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3377">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3378">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3378">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3379">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3379">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3380">正则表达式  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3380">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3381">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3381">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_finland_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3383">Keywords_finland_eu_driver "s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3383">Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3384">通讯#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3384">dl#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3386">驱动程序许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3386">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3387">驱动程序许可证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3387">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3388">驱动程序许可证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3388">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3389">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3389">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3390">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3390">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3391">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3391">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3392">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3392">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3393">驾驶许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3393">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3394">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3394">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3395">dlno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3395">dlno#</span></span>

## <a name="finland-european-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3397">芬兰欧洲健康保险电话号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3397">Finland european health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3398">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3398">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3399">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3399">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3400">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3400">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3401">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3401">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3402">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3402">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3403">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3403">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3404">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3404">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3405">20位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3405">20 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3406">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3406">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3407">20位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3407">20-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3408">10位数-8024680246</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3408">ten digits - 8024680246</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3409">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3409">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3410">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3410">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3411">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3411">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3412">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3412">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3413">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3413">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3414">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3414">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3415">正则表达式 Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3415">The regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3416">找到 Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3416">A keyword from Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland European Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="60f75aed-81bf-4625-89b0-0846b9248ee7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3417">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3417">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="finland-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3434">芬兰国家/地区 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3434">Finland national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3435">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3435">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3436">6个数字加上一个字符，表示一个世纪加上三个数字加上校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3436">six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3437">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3437">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3438">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3438">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3439">6位数，格式格式为 DDMMYY，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3439">six digits in the format format DDMMYY which are a date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3440">世纪标记 (是 "-"、"+" 或 "a" ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3440">century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3441">三位数的个人标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3441">three-digit personal identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3442">不区分大小写的数字或字母 () 是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3442">a digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3443">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3443">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3444">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3444">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3445">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3445">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3446">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3446">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3447">函数 Func_finnish_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3447">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3448">找到 Keyword_finnish_national_id 中的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3448">a keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3449">校验和传递</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3449">the checksum passes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3450">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3450">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3451">函数 Func_finnish_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3451">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3452">校验和传递</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3452">the checksum passes</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finnish National ID-->
      <Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3501">芬兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3501">Finland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3502">此敏感信息类型实体可用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3502">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3503">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3503">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3504">九个字母和数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3504">combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3505">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3505">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3506">九个字母和数字的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3506">combination of nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3507">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3507">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3508">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3508">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3509">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3509">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3510">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3510">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3511">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3511">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3512">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3512">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3513">正则表达式 Regex_finland_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3513">The regular expression Regex_finland_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3514">找到 Keywords_eu_passport_number_common 或 Keyword_finland_passport_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3514">A keyword from Keywords_eu_passport_number_common or Keyword_finland_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Finland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3533">passi#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3533">passi#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3534">passi 编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3534">passi number</span></span>


## <a name="finland-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3535">芬兰社会保障号或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3535">Finland social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3536">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号码或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3536">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3537">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3537">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3538">指定格式的11个字符的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3538">An 11-character combination in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3539">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3539">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3540">指定格式的11个字符的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3540">an 11-character combination in the specified format:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3541">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3541">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3542">以下任一实例：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3542">one instance of one of the following:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3543">加号符号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3543">plus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3544">负号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3544">minus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3545">字母 "A" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3545">the letter "A" (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3546">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3546">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3547">一个字母或一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3547">one letter or one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3548">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3548">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3549">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3549">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3550">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3550">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3551">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3551">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3552">函数  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3552">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3553">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3553">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3554">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3554">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3555">函数  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3555">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3561">芬兰国家/地区 id 号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3561">finnish national id number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3565">国家/地区 id 编号。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3565">national id no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3566">国家/地区 id 号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3566">national id number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3568">tunnistenumero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3568">tunnistenumero</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3569">henkilötunnus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3569">henkilötunnus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3570">yksilöllinen henkilökohtainen tunnistenumero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3570">yksilöllinen henkilökohtainen tunnistenumero</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3571">ainutlaatuinen henkilökohtainen tunnus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3571">ainutlaatuinen henkilökohtainen tunnus</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3576">tunnusnumero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3576">tunnusnumero</span></span>

## <a name="france-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3579">法国驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3579">France driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3580">此敏感信息类型实体在欧盟驱动程序的 "敏感信息类型" 中可用，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3580">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3581">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3581">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3582">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3582">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3583">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3583">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3584">12 个数字，会对类似模式（如法国电话号码）进行验证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3584">12 digits with validation to discount similar patterns such as French telephone numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3585">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3585">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3586">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3586">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3587">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3587">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3588">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3588">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3589">函数 Func_french_drivers_license 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3589">the function Func_french_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3590">至少满足以下条件之一：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3590">at least one of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3591">找到 Keyword_french_drivers_license 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3591">a keyword from Keyword_french_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3592">函数 Func_eu_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3592">the function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="18e55a36-a01b-4b0f-943d-dc10282a1824" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_drivers_license" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_french_drivers_license" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3593">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3593">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_french_drivers_license"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3594">Keyword_french_drivers_license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3594">Keyword_french_drivers_license</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3595">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3595">drivers licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3597">driving licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3597">driving licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3598">driving license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3598">driving license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3599">permis de conduire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3599">permis de conduire</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3600">licence number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3600">licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3601">license number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3601">license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3602">licence numbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3602">licence numbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3603">license numbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3603">license numbers</span></span>


## <a name="france-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3604">法国健康保险号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3604">France health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3605">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3605">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3606">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3606">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3607">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3607">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3608">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3608">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3609">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3609">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3610">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3610">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3611">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3611">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3612">21位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3612">21 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3613">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3613">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3614">21位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3614">21 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3615">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3615">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3616">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3616">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3617">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3617">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3618">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3618">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3619">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3619">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3620">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3620">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3621">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3621">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3622">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3622">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3623">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3623">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3624">正则表达式 Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3624">the regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3625">找到 Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3625">a keyword from Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="9bc2069e-76df-4ff9-ac02-2f519469e236" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3626">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3626">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_france_health_insurance_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3627">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3627">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3628">保险卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3628">insurance card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3629">vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3629">carte vitale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3630">d'assuré社交</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3630">carte d'assuré social</span></span>


## <a name="france-national-id-card-cni"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3631">法国国家 id 卡片 (CNI) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3631">France national id card (CNI)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3632">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3632">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3633">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3633">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3634">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3634">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3635">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3635">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3636">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3636">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3637">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3637">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3638">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3638">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3639">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3639">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3640">正则表达式 Regex_france_cni 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3640">The regular expression Regex_france_cni finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3641">找到 Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3641">A keyword from Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France CNI -->
    <Entity id="f741ac74-1bc0-4665-b69b-f0c7f927c0c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="65">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_france_cni" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3655">法国护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3655">France passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3656">此敏感信息类型实体可用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3656">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3657">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3657">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3658">9个数字和字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3658">nine digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3659">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3659">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3660">9个数字和字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3660">nine digits and letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3661">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3661">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3662">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3662">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3663">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3663">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3664">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3664">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3665">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3665">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3666">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3666">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3667">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3667">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3668">函数 Func_fr_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3668">The function Func_fr_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3669">找到 Keyword_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3669">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Passport Number -->
<Entity id="3008b884-8c8c-4cd8-a289-99f34fc7ff5d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3678">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3678">passportnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3679">パスポート</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3679">パスポート</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3681">パスポートのNum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3681">パスポートのNum</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3688">PasseportNon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3688">PasseportNon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3689">Passeportn °</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3689">Passeportn °</span></span>

      
## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3690">法国社会保障号 (INSEE) 或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3690">France social security number (INSEE) or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3691">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟社会保险号和等效 ID 敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3691">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number and Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3692">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3692">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3693">15 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3693">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3694">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3694">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3695">必须匹配两种模式之一：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3695">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3696">13位数，后跟一个空格，后跟两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3696">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3697">或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3697">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3698">15 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3698">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3699">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3699">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3700">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3700">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3701">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3701">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3702">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 95% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3702">A DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3703">函数 Func_french_insee 或 Func_fr_insee 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3703">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3704">找到 Keyword_fr_insee 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3704">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3705">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3705">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3706">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3706">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3707">函数 Func_french_insee 或 Func_fr_insee 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3707">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3708">未找到 Keyword_fr_insee 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3708">No keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3709">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3709">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France INSEE -->
<Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3735">法国纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3735">France tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3736">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3736">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3737">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3737">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3738">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3738">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3739">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3739">13 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3740">一个数字，必须为0、1、2或3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3740">One digit that must be 0, 1, 2, or 3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3741">1位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3741">1 digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3742">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3742">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3743">2位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3743">2 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3744">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3744">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3745">3位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3745">3 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3746">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3746">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3747">3位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3747">3 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3748">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3748">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3749">3个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3749">3 check digits</span></span> 

  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3750">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3750">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3751">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3751">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3752">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3752">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3753">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3753">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3754">函数  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3754">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3755">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3755">A keyword from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3756">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3756">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3757">函数  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3757">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- France Tax Identification Number (numéro SPI.) -->
      <Entity id="ed59e77e-171d-442c-9ec1-88e2ebcb5b0a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="france-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3777">法国增值税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3777">France value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3778">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3778">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3779">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3779">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3780">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3780">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3781">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3781">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3782">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3782">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3783">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3783">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3784">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3784">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3785">13个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3785">13 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3786">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3786">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3787">13个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3787">13 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3788">两个字母-FR (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3788">two letters  - FR (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3789">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3789">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3790">两个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3790">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3791">可选空格、点号、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3791">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3792">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3792">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3793">可选空格、点号、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3793">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3794">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3794">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3795">可选空格、点号、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3795">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3796">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3796">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3797">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3797">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3798">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3798">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3799">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3799">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3800">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3800">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3801">函数 Func_france_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3801">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3802">找到 Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3802">A keyword from Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3803">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3803">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3804">函数 Func_france_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3804">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="949121e6-ad9f-4379-8731-710342baea78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3805">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3805">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_france_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3806">Keyword_France_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3806">Keyword_France_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3809">vat#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3809">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3810">增值税</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3810">value added tax</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3811">siren 标识无 numéro d'identification taxe sur valeur ajoutée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3811">siren identification no numéro d'identification taxe sur valeur ajoutée</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3812">taxe valeur ajoutée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3812">taxe valeur ajoutée</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3813">taxe sur la valeur ajoutée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3813">taxe sur la valeur ajoutée</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3814">n ° tva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3814">n° tva</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3815">numéro de tva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3815">numéro de tva</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3816">numéro d'identification siren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3816">numéro d'identification siren</span></span>


## <a name="germany-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3817">德国驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3817">Germany driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3818">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驱动程序的 "敏感信息类型" 中，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3818">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3819">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3819">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3820">11个数字和字母的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3820">combination of 11 digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3821">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3821">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3822">11 位数字和字母（不区分大小写）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3822">11 digits and letters (not case sensitive):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3823">一个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3823">a digit or letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3824">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3824">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3825">六个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3825">six digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3826">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3826">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3827">一个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3827">a digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3828">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3828">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3829">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3829">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3830">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3830">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3831">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3831">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3832">函数 Func_german_drivers_license 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3832">The function Func_german_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3833">下列至少其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3833">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3834">找到 Keyword_german_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3834">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3835">找到 Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3835">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3836">找到 Keyword_german_drivers_license 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3836">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3837">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3837">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="91da9335-1edb-45b7-a95f-5fe41a16c63c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_drivers_license" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_german_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3839">Keyword_german_drivers_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3839">Keyword_german_drivers_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3857">Fuehrerschein- Nr</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3857">Fuehrerschein- Nr</span></span>

## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3930">德国身份卡片编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3930">Germany identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3931">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3931">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3932">自2010年11月1日起：九个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3932">since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3933">从1年4月1987至31年10月2010：10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3933">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3934">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3934">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3935">自2010年11月1日起：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3935">since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3936">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3936">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3937">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3937">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3938">介于1年4月1987至 31 10 月2010：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3938">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3939">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3939">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3940">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3940">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3941">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3941">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3942">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3942">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3943">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3943">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3944">正则表达式 Regex_germany_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3944">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3945">找到 Keyword_germany_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3945">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3950">id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3950">identification</span></span>
