## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3961">德国护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3961">Germany passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3962">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟护照号敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3962">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3963">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3963">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3964">10个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3964">ten digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3965">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3965">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3966">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3966">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3967">第一个字符是数字或从该集合中的字母 (C、F、G、H、J、K) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3967">first character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3968">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3968">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3969">此集合中的五个数字或字母 (C、-H、J-N、P、R、T、V-Z) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3969">five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3970">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3970">a digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3971">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3971">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3972">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3972">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3973">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3973">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3974">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3974">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3975">函数 Func_german_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3975">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3976">找到了中的关键字 `Keyword_german_passport` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3976">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3977">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3977">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3978">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3978">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3979">函数 Func_german_passport_data 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3979">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3980">找到了中的关键字 `Keyword_german_passport` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3980">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3981">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3981">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3993">德国税号标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3993">Germany tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3994">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3994">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3995">11个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3995">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3996">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3996">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3997">11位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3997">11 digits :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3998">两位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3998">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-3999">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-3999">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4000">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4000">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4001">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4001">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4002">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4002">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4003">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4003">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4004">两位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4004">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4005">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4005">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4006">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4006">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4007">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4007">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4008">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4008">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4009">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4009">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4010">函数  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4010">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4011">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4011">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4012">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4012">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4013">函数  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4013">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Germany Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="43316a89-9880-40cf-b980-04bc7eefcec5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4039">德国增值税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4039">Germany value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4040">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4040">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4041">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4041">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4042">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4042">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4043">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4043">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4044">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4044">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4045">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4045">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4046">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4046">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4047">11个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4047">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4048">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4048">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4049">11个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4049">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4050">字母 D 或 D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4050">a letter D or d</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4051">字母 E 或 E</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4051">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4052">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4052">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4053">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4053">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4054">可选空格或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4054">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4055">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4055">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4056">可选空格或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4056">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4057">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4057">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4058">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4058">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4059">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4059">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4060">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4060">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4061">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4061">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4062">函数 Func_germany_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4062">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4063">找到 Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4063">A keyword from Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4064">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4064">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4065">函数 Func_germany_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4065">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Germany Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="db177eb2-8811-4842-bffc-128c14aa219f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4066">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4066">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4067">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4067">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4068">vat 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4068">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4069">vat 编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4069">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4070">vat#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4070">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4071">vat # mehrwertsteuer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4071">vat#  mehrwertsteuer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4072">mwst</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4072">mwst</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4073">mehrwertsteuer identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4073">mehrwertsteuer identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4074">mehrwertsteuer nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4074">mehrwertsteuer nummer</span></span>


## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4075">希腊驱动程序的许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4075">Greece driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4076">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驱动程序的 "敏感信息类型" 中，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4076">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4077">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4077">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4078">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4078">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4079">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4079">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4080">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4080">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4081">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4081">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4082">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4082">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4083">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4083">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4084">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4084">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4085">正则表达式  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4085">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4086">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4086">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-national-id-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4103">希腊国家 ID 卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4103">Greece national ID card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4104">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4104">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4105">7-8 个字母和数字组合加一个短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4105">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4106">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4106">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4107">七个字母和数字（旧格式）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4107">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4108">一个字母（希腊字母表中的任一字母） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4108">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4109">一个短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4109">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4110">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4110">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4111">八个字母和数字（新格式）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4111">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4112">大写字符同时出现在希腊和拉丁字母表中的两个字母 (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4112">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4113">一个短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4113">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4114">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4114">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4115">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4115">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4116">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4116">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4117">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4117">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4118">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4118">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4119">正则表达式 Regex_greece_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4119">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4120">找到 Keyword_greece_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4120">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4121">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4121">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4122">正则表达式 Regex_greece_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4122">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece National ID Card -->
      <Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4128">希腊警察 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4128">greek police id</span></span>

## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4133">希腊护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4133">Greece passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4134">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4134">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4135">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4135">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4136">两个字母后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4136">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4137">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4137">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4138">两个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4138">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4139">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4139">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4140">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4140">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4141">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4141">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4142">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4142">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4143">正则表达式  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4143">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4144">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4144">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4161">希腊税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4161">Greece tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4162">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4162">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4163">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4163">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4164">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4164">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4165">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4165">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4166">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4166">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4167">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4167">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4168">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4168">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4169">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4169">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4170">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4170">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4171">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4171">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4172">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4172">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4173">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4173">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4174">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4174">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4175">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4175">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4176">正则表达式  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4176">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4177">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4177">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greek Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="15a54a5a-53d4-4080-ad43-a2a4fe1d3bf7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4178">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4178">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4179">Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4179">Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4206">香港 HKID) 号码的香港身份卡片 (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4206">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4207">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4207">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4208">8-9 个字母和数字组合，最后一个字符两边可选择加括号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4208">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4209">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4209">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4210">8-9 个字母组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4210">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4211">1-2 个字母（不区分大小写） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4211">1-2 letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4212">六个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4212">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4213">最后一个字符（任意数字或字母 A）是校验位，两边可以选择加括号。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4213">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4214">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4214">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4215">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4215">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4216">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4216">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4217">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4217">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4218">函数 Func_hong_kong_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4218">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4219">找到 Keyword_hong_kong_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4219">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4220">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4220">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4221">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4221">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4222">函数 Func_hong_kong_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4222">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4223">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4223">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4263">匈牙利驱动程序的许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4263">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4264">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4264">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4265">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4265">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4266">两个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4266">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4267">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4267">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4268">两个字母和六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4268">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4269">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4269">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4270">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4270">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4271">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4271">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4272">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4272">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4273">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4273">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4274">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4274">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4275">正则表达式  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4275">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4276">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4276">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4292">匈牙利个人标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4292">Hungary personal identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4293">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4293">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4294">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4294">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4295">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4295">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4296">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4296">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4297">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4297">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4298">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4298">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4299">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4299">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4300">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4300">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4301">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4301">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4302">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4302">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4303">一种与性别相对应的数字 (1-男、2-女、其他号码也可能适用于在具有双公民的1900或公民之前出生的公民) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4303">One digit that corresponds to gender (1-male, 2-female, other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4304">与出生日期 (YYMMDD) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4304">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4305">与序列号对应的三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4305">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4306">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4306">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4307">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4307">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4308">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4308">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4309">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4309">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4310">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4310">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4311">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4311">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4312">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4312">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4313">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4313">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4314">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4314">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="7b5cc218-7046-47d9-80c9-f325b50896ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4316">Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4316">Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4317">id 号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4317">id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4318">identification number
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4318">identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4319">sz ig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4319">sz ig</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4320">sz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4320">sz.</span></span><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4321">ig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4321"> ig.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4322">ig。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4322">sz.ig.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4323">személyazonosító igazolvány</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4323">személyazonosító igazolvány</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4324">személyi igazolvány</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4324">személyi igazolvány</span></span>


## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4325">匈牙利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4325">Hungary passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4326">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4326">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4327">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4327">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4328">两个字母后跟6个或7个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4328">Two letters followed by six or seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4329">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4329">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4330">两个字母后跟六个或七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4330">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4331">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4331">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4332">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4332">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4333">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4333">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4334">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4334">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4335">正则表达式  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4335">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4336">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4336">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4353">匈牙利社会安全号码或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4353">Hungary social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4354">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号码或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4354">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4355">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4355">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4356">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4356">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4357">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4357">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4358">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4358">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4359">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4359">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4360">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4360">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4361">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4361">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4362">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4362">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4363">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4363">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4364">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4364">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4365">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4365">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4366">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4366">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4386">匈牙利纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4386">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4387">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4387">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4388">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4388">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4389">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4389">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4390">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4390">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4391">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4391">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4392">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4392">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4393">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4393">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4394">10个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4394">Ten digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4395">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4395">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4396">10位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4396">Ten digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4397">一个必须为 "8" 的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4397">One digit that must be "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4398">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4398">Eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4399">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4399">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4400">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4400">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4401">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4401">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4402">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4402">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4403">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4403">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4404">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4404">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4405">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4405">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4406">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4406">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4407">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4407">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="ede42eb4-59d9-49eb-9603-d7853fbda91d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4433">匈牙利增值税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4433">Hungary value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4434">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4434">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4435">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4435">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4436">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4436">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4437">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4437">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4438">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4438">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4439">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4439">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4440">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4440">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4441">10个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4441">10 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4442">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4442">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4443">10个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4443">10 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4444">2个字母-HU 或 HU</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4444">2 letters - HU or hu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4445">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4445">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4446">8位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4446">8 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4447">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4447">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4448">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4448">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4449">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4449">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4450">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4450">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4451">函数 Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4451">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4452">找到 Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4452">A keyword from Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4453">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4453">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4454">函数 Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4454">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="976349a0-683b-477a-90f8-ff0a220d5592" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_hungary_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4456">Keyword_Hungary_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4456">Keyword_Hungary_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4459">vat#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4459">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4460">vatno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4460">vatno#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4465">általános forgalmi adó szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4465">általános forgalmi adó szám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4466">hozzáadottérték adó</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4466">hozzáadottérték adó</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4467">áfa szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4467">áfa szám</span></span>


## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4468"> (PAN) 的印度永久帐户号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4468">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4469">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4469">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4470">10 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4470">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4471">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4471">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4472">10 个字母或数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4472">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4473">五个字母（不区分大小写） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4473">Five letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4474">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4474">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4475">一个字母，是字母校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4475">A letter which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4476">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4476">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4477">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4477">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4478">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4478">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4479">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4479">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4480">正则表达式 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4480">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4481">找到 Keyword_india_permanent_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4481">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4482">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4482">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
<Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4483">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4483">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_india_permanent_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4484">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4484">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4485">Permanent Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4485">Permanent Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4486">蛋糕</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4486">PAN</span></span> 
   
## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4487">印度唯一标识 (Aadhaar) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4487">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4488">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4488">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4489">12 个数字（包含可选空格或短划线）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4489">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4490">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4490">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4491">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4491">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4492">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4492">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4493">一个可选空格或短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4493">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4494">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4494">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4495">一个可选空格或短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4495">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4496">最后一个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4496">The final digit which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4497">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4497">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4498">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4498">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4499">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4499">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4500">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4500">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4501">函数 Func_india_aadhaar 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4501">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4502">找到 Keyword_india_aadhar 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4502">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4503">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4503">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- 
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4504">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4504">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4505">函数 Func_india_aadhaar 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4505">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4506">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4506">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4507">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4507">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_india_aadhar"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4508">Keyword_india_aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4508">Keyword_india_aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4509">Aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4509">Aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4510">Aadhaar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4510">Aadhaar</span></span>
