## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4513">印度尼西亚身份卡片 (KTP) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4513">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4514">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4514">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4515">16 个数字（包含可选点）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4515">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4516">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4516">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4517">16 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4517">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4518">两位省代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4518">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4519">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4519">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4520">两位摄政统治区或城市代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4520">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4521">两位住宅小区代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4521">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4522">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4522">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4523">六个数字，采用  DDMMYY 格式，代表出生日期 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4523">Six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4524">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4524">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4525">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4525">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4526">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4526">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4527">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4527">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4528">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4528">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4529">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4529">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4530">正则表达式 Regex_indonesia_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4530">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4531">找到 Keyword_indonesia_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4531">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4532">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4532">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_indonesia_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4533">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4533">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4534">KTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4534">KTP</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4535">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4535">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4536">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4536">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span></span> 
   
## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4537"> (IBAN) 的国际银行帐户号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4537">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4538">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4538">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4539">国家/地区代码（两个字母）加校验位（两个数字）以及 bban 号码（最多 30 个字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4539">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4540">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4540">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4541">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4541">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4542">两个字母的国家/地区代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4542">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4543">两个校验位（后跟一个可选空间） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4543">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4544">1-7 个包含 4 个字母或数字的组（可以使用空格进行分隔）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4544">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4545">1-3 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4545">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-p133">每个国家/地区的格式稍有不同。IBAN 敏感信息类型涵盖这 60 个国家/地区：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-p133">The format for each country is slightly different. The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4548">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4548">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4549">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4549">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4550">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4550">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4551">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4551">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4552">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4552">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4553">函数 Func_iban 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4553">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4554">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4554">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4555">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4555">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4556">None</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4556">None</span></span>

   
## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-10-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4557">国际分类的 diseases (ICD-10-CM) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4557">International classification of diseases (ICD-10-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4558">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4558">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4559">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4559">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4560">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4560">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4561">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4561">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4562">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4562">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4563">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4563">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4564">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4564">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4565">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4565">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4566">找到 Dictionary_icd_10_updated 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4566">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4567">找到 Dictionary_icd_10_codes 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4567">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4568">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4568">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4569">找到 Dictionary_icd_10_ 更新的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4569">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_ updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- ICD-10 CM -->
      <Entity id="3356946c-6bb7-449b-b253-6ffa419c0ce7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
        </Pattern>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4570">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4570">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4571">Dictionary_icd_10_updated 关键字词典中的任何术语，基于 [国际分类 Diseases、第10次修订、临床修改 (icd-10-CM) ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4571">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4572">此类型仅查找术语，而不是保险代码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4572">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4573">Dictionary_icd_10_codes 关键字词典中的任何术语，基于 [国际分类 Diseases、第10次修订、临床修改 (icd-10-CM) ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4573">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4574">此类型仅查找保险业代码，而不是说明。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4574">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-9-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4575">国际分类的 diseases (ICD-9-CM) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4575">International classification of diseases (ICD-9-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4576">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4576">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4577">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4577">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4578">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4578">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4579">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4579">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4580">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4580">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4581">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4581">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4582">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4582">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4583">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4583">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4584">找到 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4584">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4585">找到 Dictionary_icd_9_codes 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4585">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4586">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4586">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4587">找到 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4587">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <Entity id="fa3f9c74-ee07-4c52-b5f2-085d6b2c0ec4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4588">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4588">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4589">Dictionary_icd_9_updated 关键字词典中的任何术语，基于 [国际分类的 Diseases、第九修订版、临床修改 (icd-9-CM) ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4589">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4590">此类型仅查找术语，而不是保险代码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4590">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4591">Dictionary_icd_9_codes 关键字词典中的任何术语，基于 [国际分类的 Diseases、第九修订版、临床修改 (icd-9-CM) ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4591">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4592">此类型仅查找保险业代码，而不是说明。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4592">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4593">IP 地址</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4593">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4594">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4594">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4595">IPv4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4595">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4596">解释 IPv4 地址格式化（点）版本或非格式化（没有点）版本的复杂模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4596">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4597">Ipv4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4597">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4598"> 解释格式化 IPv6 号码（包含冒号）的复杂模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4598">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4599">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4599">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4600">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4600">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4601">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4601">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4602">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4602">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4603">对于 IPv6，在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4603">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4604">正则表达式 Regex_ipv6_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4604">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4605">未找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4605">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4606">对于 IPv4，在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 95% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4606">For IPv4, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4607">正则表达式 Regex_ipv4_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4607">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4608">找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4608">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4609">对于 IPv6，在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 95% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4609">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4610">正则表达式 Regex_ipv6_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4610">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4611">未找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4611">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4614">IP（此关键字区分大小写）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4614">IP (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4615">ip address</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4615">ip address</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4616">ip addresses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4616">ip addresses</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4619">爱尔兰驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4619">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4620">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4620">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4621">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4621">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4622">6位数，后跟四个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4622">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4623">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4623">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4624">6位数字和四个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4624">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4625">六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4625">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4626">四个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4626">Four letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4627">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4627">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4628">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4628">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4629">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4629">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4630">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4630">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4631">正则表达式  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4631">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4632">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4632">A keyword from  `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4648">爱尔兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4648">Ireland passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4649">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4649">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4650">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4650">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4651">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4651">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4652">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4652">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4653">两个字母或数字，后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4653">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4654">两位数字或字母（不区分大小写）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4654">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4655">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4655">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4656">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4656">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4657">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4657">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4658">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4658">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4659">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4659">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4660">正则表达式  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4660">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4661">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4661">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4682">爱尔兰个人公开服务 (PPS) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4682">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4683">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4683">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4684">旧格式 (到 31 Dec 2012) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4684">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4685">七位数字后跟1-2 个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4685">seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4686">新格式 (1 Jan 2013 和) 之后）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4686">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4687">七位数字后跟两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4687">seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4688">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4688">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4689">旧格式 (到 31 Dec 2012) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4689">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4690">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4690">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4691">一到两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4691">one to two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4692">新格式 (1 Jan 2013 和) 之后）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4692">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4693">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4693">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4694">字母 (区分大小写) 这是字母校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4694">a letter (not case sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4695">一个-I 范围内的可选字母，或 "W"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4695">An optional letter in the range A-I, or “W”</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4696">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4696">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4697">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4697">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4698">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4698">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4699">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4699">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4700">函数 Func_ireland_pps 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4700">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4701">找到 Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4701">A keyword from Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4702">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4702">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4703">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4703">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4704">函数 Func_ireland_pps 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4704">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4705">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4705">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
      <Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4750">以色列银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4750">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4751">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4751">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4752">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4752">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4753">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4753">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4754">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4754">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4755">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4755">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4756">短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4756">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4757">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4757">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4758">短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4758">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4759">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4759">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4760">纯</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4760">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4761">	13 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4761">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4762">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4762">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4763">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4763">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4764">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4764">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4765">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4765">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4766">正则表达式 Regex_israel_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4766">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4767">找到 Keyword_israel_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4767">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4768">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4768">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4769">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4769">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4770">Bank Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4770">Bank Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4771">Bank Account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4771">Bank Account</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4772">Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4772">Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4773">מספר חשבון בנק</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4773">מספר חשבון בנק</span></span> 
   
## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4774">以色列国家身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4774">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4775">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4775">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4776">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4776">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4777">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4777">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4778">九个连续数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4778">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4779">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4779">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4780">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4780">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4781">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4781">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4782">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4782">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4783">函数 Func_israeli_national_id_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4783">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4784">找到 Keyword_Israel_National_ID 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4784">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4785">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4785">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4786">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4786">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4787">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4787">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4788">מספר זהות</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4788">מספר זהות</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4789">National ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4789">National ID Number</span></span>
   
## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4790">意大利驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4790">Italy driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4791">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驱动程序的 "敏感信息类型" 中，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4791">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4792">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4792">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4793">10个字母和数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4793">a combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4794">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4794">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4795">10个字母和数字的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4795">a combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4796">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4796">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4797">字母 "A" 或 "V" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4797">the letter "A" or "V" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4798">七个字母 (不区分大小写) 、数字或下划线字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4798">seven letters (not case sensitive), digits, or the underscore character</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4799">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4799">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4800">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4800">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4801">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4801">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4802">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4802">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4803">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4803">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4804">正则表达式 Regex_italy_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4804">The regular expression Regex_italy_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4805">找到 Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4805">A keyword from Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
<Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4806">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4806">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_italy_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4807">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4807">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4808">numero di patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4808">numero di patente di guida</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4809">patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4809">patente di guida</span></span> 

## <a name="italy-fiscal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4810">意大利会计代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4810">Italy fiscal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4811">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4811">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4812">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4812">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4813">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4813">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4814">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4814">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4815">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4815">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4816">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4816">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4817">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4817">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4818">在指定模式中，由16个字符组成的字母和数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4818">a 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4819">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4819">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4820">字母和数字的16个字符的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4820">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4821">与系列名称中的前三个辅音对应的三个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4821">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4822">与名字中的第一个、第三个和第四个辅音对应的三个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4822">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4823">与出生年份的最后一个数字对应的两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4823">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4824">一个与出生月份的字母相对应的字母–字母按字母顺序使用，但仅使用字母 A 到 E、H、L、M、P、R 和 T (因此，一月为 A，10月为 R) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4824">one letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (thus, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4825">与出生月份的某一天对应的两个数字，为了区分 genders，40已添加到女性的出生日。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4825">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth—in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4826">与特定于 municipality 的区域代码相对应的四个数字，该用户的出生国家 (国家/地区内的代码用于外国国家) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4826">four digits that corresponds to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4827">一个奇偶校验数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4827">one parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4828">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4828">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4829">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4829">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4830">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4830">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4831">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4831">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4832">函数  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4832">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4833">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4833">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4834">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4834">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4835">函数  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4835">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Fiscal Code -->
      <Entity id="4cd79172-8da9-4ff5-9188-98b1e7e2eca6" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4870">意大利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4870">Italy passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4871">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4871">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4872">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4872">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4873">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4873">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4874">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4874">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4875">两个字母或数字，后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4875">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4876">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4876">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4877">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4877">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4878">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4878">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4879">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4879">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4880">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4880">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4881">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4881">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4882">正则表达式  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4882">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4883">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4883">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_italy_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4896">Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4896">Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4897">italiana passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4897">italiana passaporto</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4898">passaporto italiana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4898">passaporto italiana</span></span>

## <a name="italy-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4904">意大利增值税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4904">Italy value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4905">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4905">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4906">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4906">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4907">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4907">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4908">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4908">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4909">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4909">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4910">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4910">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4911">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4911">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4912">带有可选分隔符的13个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4912">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4913">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4913">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4914">带有可选分隔符的13个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4914">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4915">I 或 i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4915">I or i</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4916">T 或 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4916">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4917">可选空格、点号、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4917">optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4918">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4918">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4919">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4919">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4920">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4920">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4921">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4921">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4922">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4922">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4923">函数 Func_italy_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4923">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4924">找到 Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4924">A keyword from Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4925">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4925">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4926">函数 Func_italy_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4926">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="26a8cc07-2283-4a2a-ab1d-4ab643c4c67f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4928">Keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4928">Keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4929">vat 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4929">vat number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4931">vat#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4931">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4932">iva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4932">iva</span></span>

## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4934">日本银行帐户号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4934">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4935">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4935">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4936">7或8位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4936">seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4937">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4937">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4938">银行帐户号码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4938">bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4939">7或8位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4939">seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4940">银行帐户分支代码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4940">bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4941">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4941">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4942">可选) 的空格或短划线 (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4942">a space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4943">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4943">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4944">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4944">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4945">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4945">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4946">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4946">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4947">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4947">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4948">函数 Func_jp_bank_account 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4948">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4949">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4949">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4950">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4950">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4951">函数 Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4951">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4952">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4952">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4953">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4953">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4954">函数 Func_jp_bank_account 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4954">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-4955">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-4955">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_jp_bank_branch_code"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5012">Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5012">Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5013">Otemachi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5013">Otemachi</span></span>

## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5014">日本驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5014">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5015">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5015">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5016">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5016">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5017">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5017">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5018">12 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5018">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5019">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5019">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5020">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5020">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5021">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5021">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5022">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5022">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5023">函数 Func_jp_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5023">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5024">找到 Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5024">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="c6011143-d087-451c-8313-7f6d4aed2270" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-my-number---corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5052">日本我的号码-公司</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5052">Japan My Number - Corporate</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5053">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5053">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5054">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5054">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5055">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5055">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5056">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5056">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5057">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5057">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5058">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5058">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5059">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5059">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5060">13位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5060">13 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5061">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5061">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5062">13位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5062">13 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5063">一位数从1到9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5063">one digit from one to nine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5064">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5064">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5065">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5065">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5066">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5066">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5067">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5067">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5068">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5068">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5069">函数 Func_japanese_my_number_corporate 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5069">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5070">找到 Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5070">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5071">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5071">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5072">函数 Func_japanese_my_number_corporate 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5072">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Corporate -->
      <Entity id="9e0eaf79-ff20-4ffb-b3e4-e7368d5db6ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-my-number---personal"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5085">日本我的号码-个人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5085">Japan My Number - Personal</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5086">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5086">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5087">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5087">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5088">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5088">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5089">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5089">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5090">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5090">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5091">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5091">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5092">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5092">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5093">12位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5093">12 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5094">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5094">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5095">12位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5095">12 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5096">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5096">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5097">可选空格、点号或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5097">an optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5098">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5098">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5099">可选空格、点号或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5099">an optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5100">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5100">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5101">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5101">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5102">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5102">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5103">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5103">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5104">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5104">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5105">函数 Func_japanese_my_number_personal 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5105">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5106">找到 Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5106">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5107">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5107">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5108">函数 Func_japanese_my_number_personal 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5108">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Personal -->
      <Entity id="98da8e66-7299-4ebd-9f82-c871ab37d3ef" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5121">日本护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5121">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5122">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5122">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5123">两个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5123">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5124">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5124">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5125">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5125">two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5126">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5126">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5127">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5127">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5128">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5128">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5129">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5129">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5130">函数 Func_jp_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5130">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5131">找到 Keyword_jp_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5131">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="75177310-1a09-4613-bf6d-833aae3743f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5132">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5132">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5133">Keyword_jp_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5133">Keyword_jp_passport</span></span>
