## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5138">日本住宅电话卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5138">Japan residence card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5139">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5139">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5140">12个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5140">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5141">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5141">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5142">12个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5142">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5143">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5143">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5144">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5144">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5145">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5145">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5146">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5146">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5147">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5147">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5148">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5148">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5149">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5149">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5150">正则表达式 Regex_jp_residence_card_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5150">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5151">找到 Keyword_jp_residence_card_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5151">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Japan Residence Card Number-->
-<Entity id="ac36fef2-a289-4e2c-bb48-b02366e89fc0" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5152">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5152">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_residence_card_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5153">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5153">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5154">住宅电话卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5154">Residence card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5155">住宅卡编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5155">Residence card no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5156">住宅卡片#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5156">Residence card #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5157">在留カード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5157">在留カード番号</span></span>

## <a name="japan-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5158">日本居民注册号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5158">Japan resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5159">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5159">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5160">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5160">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5161">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5161">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5162">11 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5162">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5163">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5163">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5164">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5164">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5165">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5165">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5166">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5166">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5167">函数 Func_jp_resident_registration_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5167">The function Func_jp_resident_registration_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5168">找到 Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5168">A keyword from Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="01c1209b-6389-4faf-a5f8-3f7e13899652" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_resident_registration_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_jp_resident_registration_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5170">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5170">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5171">Resident Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5171">Resident Registration Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5172">Resident Register Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5172">Resident Register Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5173">Residents Basic Registry Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5173">Residents Basic Registry Number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5175">Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5175">Resident Register No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5176">Residents Basic Registry No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5176">Residents Basic Registry No.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5178">住民登録番号、登録番号をレジデント</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5178">住民登録番号、登録番号をレジデント</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5179">住民基本登録番号、登録番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5179">住民基本登録番号、登録番号</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5180">住民基本レジストリ番号を常駐</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5180">住民基本レジストリ番号を常駐</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5181">登録番号を常駐住民基本台帳登録番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5181">登録番号を常駐住民基本台帳登録番号</span></span> 

   
## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5182">日本社会保险号 (SIN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5182">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5183">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5183">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5184">7-12 个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5184">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5185">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5185">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5186">7-12 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5186">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5187">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5187">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5188">连字符 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5188">a hyphen (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5189">六位数字或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5189">six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5190">7-12 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5190">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5191">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5191">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5192">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5192">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5193">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5193">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5194">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5194">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5195">函数 Func_jp_sin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5195">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5196">找到 Keyword_jp_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5196">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5197">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5197">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5198">函数 Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5198">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5199">找到 Keyword_jp_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5199">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5200">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5200">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5201">Keyword_jp_sin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5201">Keyword_jp_sin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5202">Social Insurance No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5202">Social Insurance No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5203">Social Insurance Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5203">Social Insurance Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5204">Social Insurance Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5204">Social Insurance Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5205">社会保険のテンキー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5205">社会保険のテンキー</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5206">社会保険番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5206">社会保険番号</span></span> 

## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5207">拉脱维亚驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5207">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5208">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5208">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5209">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5209">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5210">三个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5210">three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5211">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5211">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5212">三个字母和六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5212">three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5213">三个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5213">three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5214">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5214">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5215">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5215">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5216">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5216">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5217">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5217">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5218">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5218">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5219">正则表达式  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5219">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5220">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5220">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5221">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5221">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_latvia_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5222">Keywords_latvia_eu_driver "s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5222">Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5223">通讯#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5223">dl#</span></span>

## <a name="latvia-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5236">拉脱维亚个人代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5236">Latvia personal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5237">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5237">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5238">11个数字和一个可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5238">11 digits and an optional hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5239">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5239">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5240">旧格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5240">Old format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5241">11个数字和一个连字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5241">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5242">与出生日期 (DDMMYY) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5242">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5243">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5243">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5244">一个数字，对应于19世纪的出生世纪 ( "0"，"1" 表示20世纪，"2" 表示21世纪) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5244">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5245">四个数字，随机生成</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5245">four digits, randomly generated</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5246">新格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5246">New format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5247">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5247">11 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5248">两位数 "32"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5248">Two digits "32"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5249">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5249">Nine digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5250">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5250">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5251">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5251">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5252">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5252">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5253">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5253">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5254">函数  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 或正则表达式 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5254">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5255">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5255">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5256">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5256">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5257">函数  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 或正则表达式 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5257">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="03fcf763-27c2-49ed-9422-2641c6c895c9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5320">拉脱维亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5320">Latvia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5321">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5321">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5322">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5322">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5323">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5323">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5324">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5324">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5325">两个字母或数字，后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5325">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5326">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5326">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5327">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5327">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5328">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5328">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5329">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5329">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5330">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5330">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5331">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5331">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5332">正则表达式  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5332">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5333">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5333">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5353">立陶宛驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5353">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5354">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5354">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5355">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5355">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5356">8位数，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5356">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5357">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5357">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5358">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5358">eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5359">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5359">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5360">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5360">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5361">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5361">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5362">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5362">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5363">正则表达式  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5363">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5364">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5364">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5380">立陶宛个人代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5380">Lithuania personal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5381">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5381">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5382">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5382">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5383">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5383">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5384">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5384">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5385">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5385">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5386">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5386">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5387">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5387">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5388">11个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5388">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5389">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5389">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5390">11个数字，不含空格和分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5390">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5391">一种数字 (1-6) ，对应于个人的性别和出生世纪</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5391">one digit (1-6) that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5392">与出生日期 (YYMMDD) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5392">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5393">与出生日期的序列号对应的三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5393">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5394">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5394">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5395">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5395">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5396">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5396">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5397">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5397">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5398">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5398">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5399">函数  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5399">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5400">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5400">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5401">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5401">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5402">函数  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5402">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="cd6d3786-8ec3-4524-a2cf-1e0095379171" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5437">立陶宛护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5437">Lithuania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5438">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5438">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5439">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5439">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5440">八个数字或字母不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5440">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5441">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5441">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5442">八个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5442">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5443">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5443">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5444">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5444">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5445">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5445">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5446">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5446">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5447">正则表达式  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5447">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5448">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5448">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5465">Luxemburg 驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5465">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5466">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5466">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5467">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5467">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5468">6位数，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5468">six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5469">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5469">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5470">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5470">six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5471">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5471">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5472">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5472">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5473">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5473">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5474">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5474">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5475">正则表达式  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5475">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5476">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5476">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5492">Luxemburg (自然个人的国家标识号码) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5492">Luxemburg national identification number (natural persons)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5493">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5493">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5494">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5494">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5495">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5495">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5496">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5496">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5497">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5497">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5498">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5498">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5499">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5499">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5500">13个不带空格或分隔符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5500">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5501">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5501">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5502">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5502">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5503">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5503">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5504">两个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5504">two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5505">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5505">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5506">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5506">yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5507">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5507">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5508">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5508">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5509">函数  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5509">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5510">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5510">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5511">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5511">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5512">函数  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5512">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 


```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="aaf661ed-29ec-426d-8bf9-880cad298ebb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5535">Luxemburg 护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5535">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5536">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5536">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5537">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5537">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5538">八个数字或字母不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5538">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5539">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5539">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5540">八个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5540">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5541">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5541">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5542">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5542">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5543">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5543">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5544">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5544">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5545">正则表达式  `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5545">The regular expression  `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5546">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5546">A keyword from  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_nation_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-non-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5553">Luxemburg 国内标识号 (非自然个人) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5553">Luxemburg national identification number (non natural persons)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5554">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5554">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5555">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5555">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5556">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5556">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5557">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5557">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5558">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5558">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5559">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5559">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5560">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5560">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5561">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5561">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5562">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5562">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5563">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5563">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5564">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5564">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5565">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5565">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5566">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5566">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5567">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5567">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5568">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5568">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5569">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5569">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5570">函数  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5570">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5571">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5571">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5572">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5572">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5573">函数  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5573">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Non-natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="84bffa3a-d805-4788-a613-b1e4df3804cf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5613">马来西亚标识卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5613">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5614">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5614">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5615">12 个数字（包含可选连字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5615">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5616">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5616">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5617">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5617">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5618">6位数，格式为 YYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5618">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5619">短划线 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5619">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5620">两个字母的出生位置代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5620">two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5621">短划线 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5621">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5622">三个随机数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5622">three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5623">一位数的性别代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5623">one-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5624">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5624">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5625">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5625">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5626">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5626">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5627">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5627">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5628">正则表达式 Regex_malaysia_id_card_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5628">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5629">找到 Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5629">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5656">马耳他驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5656">Malta driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5657">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5657">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5658">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5658">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5659">两个字符与指定模式中的六个数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5659">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5660">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5660">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5661">两个字符和六个数字的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5661">combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5662">两个字符 (数字或字母，而不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5662">two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5663">空格 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5663">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5664">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5664">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5665">空格 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5665">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5666">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5666">three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5667">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5667">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5668">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5668">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5669">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5669">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5670">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5670">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5671">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5671">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5672">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5672">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
 <Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5678">驱动程序许可证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5678">driver licence</span></span>

## <a name="malta-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5688">马耳他身份卡片号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5688">Malta identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5689">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5689">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5690">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5690">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5691">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5691">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5692">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5692">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5693">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5693">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5694">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5694">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5695">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5695">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5696">七位数字后跟一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5696">seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5697">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5697">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5698">七位数字后跟一个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5698">seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5699">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5699">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5700">在 "M、G、A、P、L、H、B、Z" (不区分大小写中的一个字母) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5700">one letter in "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (case insensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5701">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5701">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5702">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5702">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5703">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5703">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5704">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5704">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5705">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5705">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5706">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5706">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5707">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5707">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5708">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5708">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Identity Card Number -->
      <Entity id="854b36b3-a388-4ac8-a4ec-677c2b5e4356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5714">kodiċi numerali personali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5714">kodiċi numerali personali</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5717">numru ta "identifikazzjoni uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5717">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni uniku</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5718">numru ta "identità uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5718">numru ta' identità uniku</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5719">numru tas-servizz taċ-ċittadin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5719">numru tas-servizz taċ-ċittadin</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5720">numru tat-taxxa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5720">numru tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5721">个人数字代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5721">personal numeric code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5722">唯一标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5722">unique identification number</span></span>

## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5725">马耳他护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5725">Malta passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5726">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5726">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5727">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5727">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5728">七位数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5728">seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5729">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5729">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5730">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5730">seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5731">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5731">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5732">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5732">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5733">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5733">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5734">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5734">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5735">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5735">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5736">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5736">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5753">马耳他税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5753">Malta tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5754">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5754">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5755">对于马耳他 nationals：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5755">For Maltese nationals:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5756">七个数字和指定模式中的一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5756">seven digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5757">非马耳他语 nationals 和马耳他语实体：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5757">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5758">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5758">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5759">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5759">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5760">马耳他 nationals：七位数和一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5760">Maltese nationals: seven digits and one letter</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5761">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5761">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5762">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5762">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5763">非马耳他语 nationals 和马耳他语实体：9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5763">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: nine digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5764">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5764">nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5765">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5765">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5766">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5766">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5767">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5767">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5768">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5768">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5769">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  或 `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5769">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5770">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5770">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5771">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5771">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5772">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 或 `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5772">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Tax ID Number -->
      <Entity id="ec830c63-65f4-45d0-9d8c-910dc8334b20" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5805">荷兰公民服务 (BSN) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5805">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5806">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5806">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5807">8-9 个数字，包含可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5807">eight-nine digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5808">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5808">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5809">8-9 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5809">eight-nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5810">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5810">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5811">空格 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5811">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5812">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5812">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5813">空格 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5813">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5814">双三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5814">two-three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5815">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5815">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5816">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5816">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5817">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5817">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5818">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5818">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5819">函数 Func_netherlands_bsn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5819">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5820">找到 Keyword_netherlands_bsn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5820">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5821">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5821">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
      <Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5845">荷兰驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5845">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5846">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5846">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5847">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5847">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5848">10个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5848">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5849">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5849">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5850">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5850">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5851">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5851">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5852">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5852">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5853">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5853">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5854">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5854">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5855">正则表达式  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5855">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5856">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5856">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5874">荷兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5874">Netherlands passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5875">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5875">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5876">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5876">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5877">九个字母或数字，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5877">nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5878">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5878">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5879">九个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5879">nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5880">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5880">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5881">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5881">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5882">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5882">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5883">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5883">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5884">正则表达式  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5884">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5885">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5885">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
