## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5895">荷兰税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5895">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5896">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5896">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5897">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5897">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5898">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5898">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5899">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5899">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5900">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5900">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5901">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5901">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5902">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5902">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5903">9个数字，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5903">nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5904">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5904">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5905">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5905">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5906">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5906">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5907">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5907">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5908">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5908">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5909">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5909">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5910">函数  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5910">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5911">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5911">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5912">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5912">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5913">函数  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5913">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="01f42a64-eba7-4892-a67b-398237e4ade2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5951">荷兰增值税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5951">Netherlands value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5952">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5952">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5953">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5953">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5954">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5954">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5955">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5955">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5956">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5956">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5957">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5957">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5958">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5958">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5959">14个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5959">14 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5960">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5960">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5961">14个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5961">14-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5962">N 或 n</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5962">N or n</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5963">L 或 l</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5963">L or l</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5964">可选空格、点号或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5964">optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5965">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5965">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5966">可选空格、点号或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5966">optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5967">B 或 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5967">B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5968">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5968">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5969">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5969">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5970">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5970">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5971">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5971">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5972">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5972">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5973">函数 Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5973">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5974">找到 Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5974">A keyword from Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5975">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5975">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5976">函数 Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5976">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="4f320d9b-4972-41ae-b337-88d499bb1ade" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5977">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5977">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_netherlands_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5978">Keyword_netherlands_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5978">Keyword_netherlands_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5985">新西兰银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5985">New Zealand bank account number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5986">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5986">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5987">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5987">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5988">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5988">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5989">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5989">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5990">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5990">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5991">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5991">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5992">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5992">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5993">14到16个带可选分隔符的数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5993">14 to 16 digit pattern with optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5994">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5994">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5995">14到16个带可选分隔符的数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5995">14 to 16 digit pattern with optional delimiter:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5996">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5996">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5997">一个可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5997">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5998">三到四位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5998">three to four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-5999">一个可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-5999">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6000">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6000">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6001">一个可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6001">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6002">两到三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6002">two to three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6003">一个选项连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6003">an options hyphen or space</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6004">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6004">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6005">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6005">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6006">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6006">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6007">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6007">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6008">函数 Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6008">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6009">找到 Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6009">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6010">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6010">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6011">函数 Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6011">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Bank Account Number -->
      <Entity id="1a97fc2b-dd2f-48f1-bc4e-2ddf25813956" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6019">新西兰驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6019">New Zealand driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6020">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6020">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6021">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6021">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6022">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6022">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6023">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6023">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6024">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6024">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6025">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6025">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6026">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6026">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6027">八个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6027">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6028">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6028">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6029">八个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6029">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6030">两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6030">two letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6031">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6031">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6032">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6032">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6033">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6033">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6034">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6034">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6035">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6035">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6036">函数 Func_newzealand_driver_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6036">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6037">找到 Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6037">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6038">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6038">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6039">函数 Func_newzealand_driver_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6039">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Driver License Number -->
      <Entity id="1924b377-d287-49c9-a737-cfe7a8a2615a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-inland-revenue-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6106">新西兰 inland 收入编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6106">New Zealand inland revenue number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6107">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6107">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6108">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6108">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6109">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6109">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6110">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6110">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6111">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6111">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6112">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6112">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6113">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6113">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6114">八个或9个带可选分隔符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6114">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6115">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6115">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6116">八个或9个带可选分隔符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6116">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6117">两个或三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6117">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6118">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6118">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6119">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6119">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6120">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6120">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6121">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6121">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6122">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6122">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6123">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6123">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6124">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6124">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6125">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6125">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6126">函数 Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6126">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6127">找到 Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6127">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6128">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6128">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6129">函数 Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6129">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Inland Revenue Number -->
      <Entity id="dd0fe2bc-7bcf-455f-bac1-83b1e3eb25fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6130">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6130">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6131">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6131">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6132">ird。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6132">ird no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6133">ird no#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6133">ird no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6134">新西兰 ird</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6134">nz ird</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6135">新西兰 ird</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6135">new zealand ird</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6136">ird 编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6136">ird number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6137">inland 收入编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6137">inland revenue number</span></span>


## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6138">新新西兰的运行状况号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6138">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6139">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6139">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6140">三个字母、一个空格 (可选) 和四位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6140">three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6141">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6141">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6142">三个字母 (不区分大小写)  (可选的空格) 四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6142">three letters (not case sensitive) a space (optional) four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6143">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6143">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6144">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6144">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6145">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6145">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6146">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6146">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6147">函数 Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6147">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6148">找到 Keyword_nz_terms 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6148">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6149">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6149">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
<Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6150">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6150">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_nz_terms"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6151">Keyword_nz_terms</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6151">Keyword_nz_terms</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6152">NHI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6152">NHI</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6153">New Zealand</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6153">New Zealand</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6154">健康</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6154">Health</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6155">治疗</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6155">treatment</span></span> 


## <a name="new-zealand-social-wlefare-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6156">新西兰社会 wlefare 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6156">New Zealand social wlefare number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6157">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6157">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6158">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6158">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6159">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6159">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6160">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6160">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6161">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6161">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6162">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6162">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6163">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6163">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6164">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6164">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6165">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6165">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6166">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6166">nine digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6167">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6167">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6168">可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6168">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6169">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6169">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6170">可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6170">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6171">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6171">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6172">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6172">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6173">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6173">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6174">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6174">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6175">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6175">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6176">函数 Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6176">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6177">找到 Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6177">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6178">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6178">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6179">函数 Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6179">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Newzealand Social Welfare Number -->
      <Entity id="20f3c48d-4ac1-4cd2-86bd-34ecc1826e9d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6187">挪威身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6187">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6188">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6188">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6189">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6189">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6190">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6190">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6191">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6191">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6192">6位数，格式为 DDMMYY，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6192">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6193">三位数的个人号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6193">three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6194">两个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6194">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6195">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6195">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6196">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6196">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6197">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6197">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6198">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6198">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6199">函数 Func_norway_id_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6199">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6200">找到 Keyword_norway_id_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6200">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6201">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6201">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6202">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6202">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6203">函数 Func_norway_id_numbe 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6203">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6204">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6204">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6213">菲律宾统一多用途标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6213">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6214">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6214">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6215">12 个数字，通过连字符分隔 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6215">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6216">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6216">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6217">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6217">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6218">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6218">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6219">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6219">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6220">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6220">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6221">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6221">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6222">一位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6222">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6223">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6223">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6224">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6224">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6225">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6225">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6226">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6226">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6227">正则表达式 Regex_philippines_unified_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6227">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6228">找到 Keyword_philippines_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6228">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6229">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6229">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_philippines_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6230">Keyword_philippines_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6230">Keyword_philippines_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6231">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6231">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6232">UMID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6232">UMID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6233">Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6233">Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6234">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6234">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6235">波兰驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6235">Poland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6236">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6236">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6237">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6237">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6238">14位数，包含2个正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6238">14 digits containing 2 forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6239">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6239">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6240">14位数和2正斜杠：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6240">14 digits and 2 forward slashes:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6241">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6241">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6242">一个正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6242">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6243">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6243">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6244">一个正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6244">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6245">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6245">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6246">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6246">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6247">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6247">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6248">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6248">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6249">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6249">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6250">正则表达式  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6250">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6251">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6251">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6252">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6252">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_poland_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6253">Keywords_poland_eu_driver "s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6253">Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6254">通讯#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6254">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6255">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6255">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6256">驱动程序许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6256">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6257">驱动程序许可证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6257">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6258">驱动程序许可证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6258">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6259">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6259">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6260">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6260">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6261">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6261">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6262">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6262">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6263">驾驶许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6263">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6264">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6264">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6265">dlno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6265">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6266">prawo jazdy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6266">prawo jazdy</span></span>

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6267">波兰恒等卡片</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6267">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6268">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6268">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6269">三个字母和六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6269">three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6270">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6270">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6271">三个字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6271">three letters (not case sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6272">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6272">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6273">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6273">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6274">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6274">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6275">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6275">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6276">函数 Func_polish_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6276">The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6277">找到 Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6277">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6278">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6278">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6279">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6279">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6280">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6280">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6281">Dowód osobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6281">Dowód osobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6282">器 dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6282">Numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6283">Nazwa i 器 dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6283">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6284">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6284">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6285">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6285">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6286">Dowód Tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6286">Dowód Tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6287">dow.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6287">dow.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6288">os.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6288">os.</span></span>

   
## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6289">波兰国 ID (PESEL) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6289">Poland national ID (PESEL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6290">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6290">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6291">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6291">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6292">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6292">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6293">表示出生日期的6个数字 YYMMDD 格式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6293">6 digits representing date of birth in the format YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6294">4位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6294">4 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6295">1校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6295">1 check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6296">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6296">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6297">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6297">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6298">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6298">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6299">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6299">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6300">函数 Func_pesel_identification_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6300">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6301">找到 Keyword_pesel_identification_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6301">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6302">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6302">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6303">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6303">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6304">函数 Func_pesel_identification_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6304">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6305">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6305">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->
      <Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
```

## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6317">波兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6317">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6318">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟护照号敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6318">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6319">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6319">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6320">两个字母和七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6320">two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6321">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6321">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6322">两个字母（不区分大小写）后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6322">Two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6323">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6323">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6324">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6324">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6325">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6325">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6326">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6326">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6327">函数 Func_polish_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6327">The function Func_polish_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6328">找到 Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6328">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6329">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6329">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
</Version>
```

## <a name="poland-regon-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6336">波兰 REGON 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6336">Poland REGON number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6337">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6337">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6338">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6338">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6339">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6339">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6340">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6340">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6341">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6341">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6342">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6342">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6343">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6343">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6344">9个数字或14个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6344">nine digit or 14 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6345">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6345">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6346">9个数字或14位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6346">nine digit or 14-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6347">九位数字或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6347">nine digits or</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6348">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6348">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6349">号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6349">hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6350">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6350">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6351">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6351">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6352">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6352">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6353">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6353">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6354">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6354">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6355">函数 Func_polish_regon_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6355">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6356">找到 Keywords_polish_regon_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6356">A keyword from Keywords_polish_regon_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6357">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6357">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6358">函数 Func_polish_regon_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6358">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Polish REGON Number  -->
      <Entity id="fc87b421-f437-4f8b-b739-29a735ead0d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6375">波兰纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6375">Poland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6376">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6376">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6377">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6377">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6378">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6378">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6379">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6379">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6380">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6380">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6381">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6381">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6382">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6382">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6383">11个不带空格或分隔符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6383">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6384">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6384">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6385">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6385">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6386">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6386">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6387">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6387">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6388">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6388">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6389">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6389">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6390">函数  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6390">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6391">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6391">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
  
```xml
      <!-- Poland Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="1ff28b4d-40f2-49e9-b677-9606a88e2bca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6421">葡萄牙公民卡片号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6421">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6422">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6422">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6423">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6423">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6424">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6424">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6425">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6425">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6426">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6426">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6427">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6427">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6428">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6428">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6429">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6429">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6430">正则表达式 Regex_portugal_citizen_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6430">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6431">找到 Keyword_portugal_citizen_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6431">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6451">葡萄牙驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6451">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6452">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6452">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6453">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6453">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6454">两个字母后跟指定模式中的七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6454">two letters followed by a seven numbers in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6455">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6455">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6456">两个字母后跟七个包含特殊字符的数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6456">two letters followed by seven numbers with special characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6457">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6457">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6458">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6458">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6459">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6459">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6460">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6460">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6461">一位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6461">one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6462">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6462">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6463">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6463">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6464">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6464">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6465">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6465">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6466">正则表达式  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6466">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6467">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6467">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6483">葡萄牙护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6483">Portugal passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6484">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6484">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6485">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6485">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6486">一个字母后跟六个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6486">one letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6487">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6487">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6488">一个字母后跟六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6488">one letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6489">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6489">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6490">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6490">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6491">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6491">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6492">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6492">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6493">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6493">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6494">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6494">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6495">正则表达式  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6495">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6496">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6496">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6520">葡萄牙税号标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6520">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6521">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6521">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6522">9个带可选空格的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6522">nine digits with optional spaces</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6523">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6523">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6524">3位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6524">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6525">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6525">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6526">3位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6526">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6527">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6527">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6528">3位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6528">3 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6529">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6529">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6530">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6530">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6531">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6531">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6532">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6532">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6533">函数  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6533">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6534">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6534">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6535">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6535">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6536">函数  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6536">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="65372402-3131-4f1e-9983-4439841d1f15" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6561">罗马尼亚驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6561">Romania driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6562">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6562">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6563">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6563">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6564">一个字符后跟八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6564">one character followed by eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6565">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6565">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6566">一个字符后跟八个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6566">one character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6567">一个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6567">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6568">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6568">eight digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6569">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6569">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6570">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6570">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6571">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6571">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6572">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6572">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6573">正则表达式  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6573">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6574">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6574">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
