## <a name="romania-personal-numeric-code-cnp"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6590">罗马尼亚个人数字代码 (CNP) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6590">Romania personal numeric code (CNP)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6591">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6591">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6592">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6592">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6593">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6593">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6594">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6594">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6595">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6595">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6596">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6596">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6597">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6597">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6598">13位数，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6598">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6599">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6599">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6600">1-9 的1位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6600">1 digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6601">代表出生日期 (YYMMDD 的6个数字) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6601">6 digits representing date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6602">2位数，可以为01-52 或99</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6602">2 digits which can be 01-52 or 99</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6603">4位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6603">4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6604">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6604">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6605">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6605">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6606">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6606">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6607">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6607">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6608">函数  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6608">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6609">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6609">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6610">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6610">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6611">函数  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6611">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Personal Numerical Code (CNP) -->
      <Entity id="eb5fa399-fe28-4c67-8188-d63a616ed89c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6662">罗马尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6662">Romania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6663">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6663">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6664">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6664">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6665">八个或9个数字，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6665">eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6666">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6666">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6667">8或9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6667">eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6668">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6668">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6669">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6669">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6670">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6670">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6671">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6671">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6672">正则表达式  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6672">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6673">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6673">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="russia-passport-number-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6688">俄罗斯护照号码（国内）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6688">Russia passport number domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6689">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6689">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6690">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6690">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6691">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6691">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6692">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6692">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6693">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6693">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6694">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6694">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6695">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6695">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6696">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6696">ten digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6697">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6697">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6698">10位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6698">ten digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6699">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6699">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6700">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6700">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6701">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6701">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6702">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6702">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6703">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6703">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6704">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6704">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6705">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6705">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6706">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6706">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6707">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6707">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6708">正则表达式 Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6708">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6709">找到 Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6709">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number Domestic -->
      <Entity id="76ec2f5d-cedb-48e1-8070-1998794af445" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="russia-passport-number-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6726">俄罗斯护照号码（国际）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6726">Russia passport number international</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6727">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6727">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6728">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6728">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6729">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6729">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6730">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6730">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6731">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6731">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6732">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6732">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6733">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6733">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6734">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6734">nine digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6735">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6735">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6736">9位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6736">nine digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6737">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6737">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6738">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6738">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6739">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6739">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6740">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6740">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6741">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6741">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6742">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6742">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6743">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6743">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6744">正则表达式 Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6744">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6745">找到 Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6745">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number International -->
      <Entity id="ac5f4878-75e4-4b82-af2d-02e13ea9f411" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6746">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6746">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_russia_passport_number_international"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6747">Keywords_russia_passport_number_international</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6747">Keywords_russia_passport_number_international</span></span>

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6762">沙特阿拉伯国家 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6762">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6763">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6763">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6764">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6764">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6765">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6765">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6766">10个连续数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6766">ten consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6767">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6767">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6768">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6768">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6769">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6769">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6770">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6770">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6771">正则表达式 Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6771">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6772">找到 Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6772">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6774">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6774">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6775">Identification Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6775">Identification Card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6777">ID number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6777">ID number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6778">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6778">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span></span> 

   
## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6779">新加坡国家注册标识卡片 (NRIC) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6779">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6780">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6780">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6781">九个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6781">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6782">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6782">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6783">九个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6783">nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6784">字母 "F"、"G"、"S" 或 "T" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6784">the letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6785">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6785">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6786">字母校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6786">an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6787">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6787">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6788">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6788">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6789">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6789">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6790">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6790">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6791">正则表达式 Regex_singapore_nric 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6791">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6792">找到 Keyword_singapore_nric 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6792">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6793">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6793">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6794">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6794">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6795">正则表达式 Regex_singapore_nric 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6795">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6796">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6796">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6807">斯洛伐克驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6807">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6808">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6808">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6809">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6809">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6810">一个字符后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6810">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6811">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6811">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6812">一个字符后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6812">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6813">一个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6813">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6814">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6814">seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6815">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6815">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6816">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6816">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6817">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6817">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6818">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6818">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6819">正则表达式  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6819">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6820">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6820">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovaknia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-personal-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6836">斯洛伐克个人号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6836">Slovakia personal number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6837">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6837">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6838">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6838">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6839">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6839">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6840">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6840">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6841">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6841">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6842">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6842">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6843">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6843">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6844">九或十个数字，包含可选反斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6844">nine or ten digits containing optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6845">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6845">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6846">代表出生日期的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6846">6 digits representing date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6847">可选的斜杠 (/) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6847">optional slash (/)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6848">3位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6848">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6849">1可选校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6849">1 optional check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6850">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6850">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6851">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6851">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6852">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6852">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6853">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6853">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6854">函数  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6854">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6855">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6855">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6856">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6856">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6857">函数  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6857">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Personal Number -->
      <Entity id="951c26b7-3b35-4f73-924b-15dd599cb9ab" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6904">斯洛伐克护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6904">Slovakia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6905">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6905">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6906">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6906">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6907">一个数字或字母后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6907">one digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6908">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6908">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6909">一个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6909">one digit or letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6910">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6910">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6911">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6911">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6912">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6912">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6913">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6913">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6914">正则表达式  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6914">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6915">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6915">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6934">斯洛文尼亚驱动程序的许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6934">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6935">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6935">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6936">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6936">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6937">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6937">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6938">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6938">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6939">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6939">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6940">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6940">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6941">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6941">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6942">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6942">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6943">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6943">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6944">正则表达式  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6944">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6945">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6945">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-unique-master-citizen-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6961">斯洛文尼亚唯一主公民号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6961">Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6962">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6962">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6963">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6963">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6964">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6964">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6965">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6965">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6966">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6966">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6967">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6967">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6968">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6968">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6969">13位数，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6969">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6970">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6970">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6971">指定模式中的13个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6971">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6972">与出生日期 (DDMMLLL) 的七位数，其中 "LLL" 对应于出生年份的后三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6972">seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6973">两个数字，对应于出生区域 "50"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6973">two digits that correspond to the area of birth "50"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6974">三个数字，对应于出生在同一天的人的性别和序列号组合， (000-499 的男和500-999 的插孔) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6974">three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day (000-499 for male and 500-999 for female)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6975">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6975">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6976">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6976">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6977">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6977">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6978">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6978">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6979">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6979">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6980">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6980">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6981">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6981">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6982">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6982">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-6983">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-6983">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number -->
      <Entity id="68948b27-803d-41e4-adf1-13e05eb541bb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7011">斯洛文尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7011">Slovenia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7012">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7012">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7013">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7013">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7014">两个字母后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7014">two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7015">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7015">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7016">两个字母后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7016">two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7017">字母 "P"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7017">the letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7018">一个大写字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7018">one uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7019">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7019">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7020">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7020">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7021">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7021">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7022">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7022">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7023">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7023">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7024">正则表达式  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7024">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7025">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7025">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7030">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7030">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7031">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7031">passports</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7032">passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7032">passportno</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7036">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7036">passportnumbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7037">护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7037">passport numbers</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7039">številka potnega lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7039">številka potnega lista</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7040">potek veljavnosti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7040">potek veljavnosti</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7043">potni 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7043">potni list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7044">številke potnih listov</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7044">številke potnih listov</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7045">斯洛文尼亚税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7045">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7046">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7046">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7047">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7047">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7048">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7048">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7049">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7049">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7050">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7050">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7051">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7051">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7052">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7052">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7053">8位数，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7053">eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7054">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7054">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7055">一个从1-9 的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7055">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7056">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7056">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7057">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7057">one check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7058">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7058">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7059">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7059">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7060">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7060">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7061">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7061">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7062">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7062">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7063">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7063">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7064">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7064">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7065">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7065">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="e47b071e-c352-4d70-8241-8c215ad65505" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7089">南非身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7089">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7090">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7090">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7091">13 个数字（可能包含空格）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7091">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7092">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7092">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7093">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7093">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7094">6位数，格式为 YYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7094">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7095">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7095">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7096">一位公民指示器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7096">a single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7097">数字 "8" 或 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7097">the digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7098">一个数字，是校验和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7098">one digit which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7099">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7099">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7100">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7100">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7101">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7101">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7102">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7102">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7103">函数 Func_south_africa_identification_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7103">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7104">找到 Keyword_south_africa_identification_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7104">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7105">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7105">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7111">韩国居民注册号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7111">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7112">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7112">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7113">13 个数字（包含连字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7113">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7114">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7114">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7115">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7115">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7116">6位数，格式为 YYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7116">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7117">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7117">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7118">由世纪和性别确定的一位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7118">one digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7119">四位数的出生区域代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7119">four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7120">一种用于区分上述号码相同的人员的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7120">one digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7121">校验位。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7121">a check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7122">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7122">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7123">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7123">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7124">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7124">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7125">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7125">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7126">函数 Func_south_korea_resident_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7126">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7127">找到 Keyword_south_korea_resident_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7127">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7128">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7128">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7129">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7129">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7130">函数 Func_south_korea_resident_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7130">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7131">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7131">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_south_korea_resident_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7133">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7133">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span></span>

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7139">西班牙驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7139">Spain driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7140">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7140">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7141">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7141">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7142">8位数，后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7142">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7143">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7143">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7144">8位数，后跟一个字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7144">eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7145">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7145">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7146">一个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7146">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7147">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7147">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7148">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7148">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7149">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7149">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7150">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7150">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7151">函数  `Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7151">The function  `Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7152">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7152">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-dni"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7189">西班牙 DNI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7189">Spain DNI</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7190">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7190">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7191">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7191">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7192">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7192">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7193">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7193">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7194">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7194">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7195">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7195">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7196">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7196">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7197">8位数，后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7197">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7198">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7198">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7199">七位数字后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7199">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7200">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7200">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7201">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7201">An optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7202">一个检查信函 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7202">one check letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7203">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7203">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7204">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7204">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7205">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7205">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7206">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7206">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7207">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7207">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7208">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7208">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7209">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7209">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7210">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7210">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

    
```xml
      <!-- Spain DNI -->
      <Entity id="8e6251b9-47b4-40e8-a42b-0f80876be192" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7234">西班牙护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7234">Spain passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7235">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7235">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7236">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7236">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7237">八个或九个字符的字母和数字的组合，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7237">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7238">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7238">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7239">字母和数字的八个或九个字符的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7239">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7240">两位数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7240">two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7241">一个数字或字母 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7241">one digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7242">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7242">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7243">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7243">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7244">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7244">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7245">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7245">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7246">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7246">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7247">正则表达式  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7247">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7248">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7248">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7274"> (SSN) 的西班牙社会安全号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7274">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7275">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟社会保险号或等效 ID 敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7275">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7276">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7276">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7277">11-12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7277">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7278">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7278">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7279">11-12 位数：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7279">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7280">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7280">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7281">可选) 的正斜杠 (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7281">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7282">七到八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7282">seven to eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7283">可选) 的正斜杠 (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7283">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7284">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7284">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7285">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7285">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7286">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7286">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7287">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7287">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7288">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7288">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7289">函数 Func_spanish_social_security_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7289">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7290">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7290">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Spain SSN -->
<Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7291">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7291">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7292">None</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7292">None</span></span>

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7293">西班牙纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7293">Spain tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7294">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7294">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7295">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7295">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7296">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7296">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7297">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7297">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7298">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7298">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7299">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7299">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7300">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7300">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7301">七个或8个数字以及指定模式中的一个或两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7301">seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7302">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7302">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7303">具有西班牙国家标识卡片的西班牙语自然人：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7303">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7304">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7304">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7305">一个大写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7305">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7306">不包含西班牙国家的非居民 Spaniards 国家标识卡片</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7306">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7307">一个大写的字母 "L" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7307">one uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7308">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7308">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7309">一个大写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7309">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7310">在没有西班牙国内身份证的14年年龄下的居民 Spaniards：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7310">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7311">一个大写的字母 "K" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7311">one uppercase letter"K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7312">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7312">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7313">一个大写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7313">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7314">带有 Foreigner 标识号的 Foreigners</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7314">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7315">一个大写的字母，为 "X"、"Y" 或 "Z" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7315">one uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7316">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7316">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7317">一个大写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7317">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7318">没有 Foreigner 标识号的 Foreigners</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7318">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7319">一个大写字母为 "M" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7319">one uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7320">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7320">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7321">一个大写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7321">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7322">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7322">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7323">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7323">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7324">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7324">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7325">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7325">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7326">函数  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7326">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7327">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7327">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7328">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7328">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7329">函数  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7329">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="10f0d113-b0e1-47dc-872a-a4f45b9376a3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
