## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7360">SQL Server 连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7360">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7361">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7361">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7362">字符串 "User Id"、"User ID"、"uid" 或 "UserId"，后跟下面模式中所述的字符和字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7362">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7363">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7363">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7364">字符串 "User Id"、"User ID"、"uid" 或 "UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7364">the string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7365">介于1-200 个字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7365">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7366">字符串 "Password" 或 "pwd"，其中 "pwd" 不以小写字母开头</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7366">the string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" is not preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7367">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7367">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7368">不是美元符号 ($) 的任何字符、百分比符号 (% ) 、大于符号 ( # A0) 、符号 ( @ ) 、引号 ( ") 、分号 (、) 、左大括号 ( [) 或左括号 ( {) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7368">any character that is not a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7369">7-128 个不是分号的字符的任意组合 (; ) 、正斜杠 (/) 或引号 ( ") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7369">any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7370">分号 (; ) 或引号 ( ") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7370">a semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7371">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7371">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7372">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7372">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7373">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7373">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7374">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7374">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7375">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7375">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7376">找 **不** 到 CEP_GlobalFilter 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7376">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter is **not** found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7377">正则表达式 **CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7377">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7378">正则表达式 **CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7378">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7379">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7379">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_globalfilter"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7380">CEP_GlobalFilter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7380">CEP_GlobalFilter</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7381">部分密码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7381">some-password</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7382">somepassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7382">somepassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7383">secretPassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7383">secretPassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7384">采用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7384">sample</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_passwordplaceholder"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7385">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7385">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7387">密码或密码后跟0-2 个空格、一个等号 (=) 、0-2 空格和一个星号 ( \* ) --或--------------</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7387">Password or pwd followed by 0-2 spaces, an equal sign (=), 0-2 spaces, and an asterisk (\*) --OR--</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7388">密码或密码后跟：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7388">Password or pwd followed by:</span></span>

    - <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7392">大于符号 ( # A0) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7392">Greater than symbol (>)</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7406">瑞典驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7406">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7407">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7407">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7408">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7408">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7409">10个数字，包含连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7409">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7410">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7410">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7411">10位数，包含连字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7411">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7412">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7412">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7413">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7413">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7414">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7414">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7415">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7415">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7416">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7416">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7417">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7417">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7418">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7418">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7419">正则表达式  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7419">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7420">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7420">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity> 
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7421">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7421">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7422">**Keywords_sweden_eu_driver "s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7422">**Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7423">通讯#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7423">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7424">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7424">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7425">驱动程序许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7425">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7426">驱动程序许可证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7426">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7427">驱动程序许可证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7427">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7428">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7428">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7429">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7429">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7430">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7430">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7431">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7431">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7432">驾驶许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7432">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7433">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7433">driving license number</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7436">瑞典国家 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7436">Sweden national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7437">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7437">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7438">10或12个数字和一个可选分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7438">ten or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7439">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7439">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7440">10或12个数字和一个可选分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7440">ten or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7441">两个数字 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7441">two digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7442">采用日期格式 YYMMDD 的六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7442">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7443">"-" 或 "+" 的分隔符 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7443">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7444">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7444">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7445">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7445">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7446">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7446">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7447">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7447">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7448">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7448">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7449">函数 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7449">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7450">找到了 from 关键字 `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7450">A keyword from `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7451">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7451">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7452">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7452">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7453">函数 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7453">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7454">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7454">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden National ID -->
    <Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7473">瑞典护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7473">Sweden passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7474">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟护照号敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7474">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7475">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7475">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7476">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7476">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7477">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7477">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7478">八个连续数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7478">eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7479">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7479">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7480">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7480">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7481">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7481">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7482">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7482">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7483">正则表达式 Regex_sweden_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7483">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7484">满足以下条件之一：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7484">one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7485">找到 Keyword_passport 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7485">a keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7486">找到 Keyword_sweden_passport 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7486">a keyword from Keyword_sweden_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
<Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7487">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7487">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_sweden_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7488">Keyword_sweden_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7488">Keyword_sweden_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7489">visa requirements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7489">visa requirements</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7490">Alien Registration Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7490">Alien Registration Card</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7517">瑞典社会保险号或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7517">Sweden social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7518">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号码或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7518">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7519">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7519">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7520">12个数字，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7520">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7521">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7521">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7522">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7522">12 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7523">对应于出生日期 (YYYYMMDD) 的8位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7523">eight digits that correspond to the birth date (YYYYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7524">与序列号对应的三个数字，其中：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7524">three digits that correspond to a serial number where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7525">序列号中的最后一个数字指示在为 "男" 分配一个奇数号码时的性别，以及一个 "女" 的偶数号码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7525">the last digit in the serial number indicates gender by the assignment of an odd number for male and an even number for female</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7526">最多1990，将序列号 corresponded 分配给那些号码的持有者出生或 (的县。如果在 1947) 之前出生，则根据纳税记录在年1月1日的) 使用特殊代码 (通常为9的 immigrants 的1947第七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7526">up to 1990, the assignment of serial number corresponded to the county where the bearer of the number was born or (if born before 1947) where he/she had been living, according to tax records, on January 1, 1947, with a special code (usually 9 as the 7th digit) for immigrants</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7527">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7527">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7528">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7528">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7529">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7529">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7530">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7530">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7531">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7531">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7532">函数  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7532">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7533">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7533">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7534">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7534">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7535">函数  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7535">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7551">瑞典纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7551">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7552">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7552">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7553">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7553">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7554">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7554">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7555">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7555">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7556">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7556">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7557">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7557">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7558">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7558">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7559">10个数字和指定模式中的符号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7559">ten digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7560">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7560">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7561">10个数字和一个符号：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7561">ten digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7562">与出生日期 (YYMMDD) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7562">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7563">正号或减号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7563">a plus sign or minus sign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7564">在以下位置使标识号唯一的三个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7564">three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7565">对于在1990之前发出的号码，第七和第八位数字标识出生的县或外部人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7565">for numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7566">第九个位置中的数字表示为奇数或甚至是女的性别</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7566">the digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7567">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7567">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7568">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7568">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7569">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7569">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7570">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7570">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7571">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7571">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7572">函数  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7572">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7573">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7573">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7574">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7574">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7575">函数  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7575">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="139acba0-a5bc-4fbb-876d-f7a493ae8a40" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7601">SWIFT 代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7601">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7602">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7602">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7603">四个字母后跟5-31 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7603">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7604">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7604">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7605">四个字母后跟5-31 个字母或数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7605">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7606">四个字母的银行代码 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7606">four-letter bank code (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7607">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7607">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7608">4-28 个字母或数字（基本银行账号 (BBAN)）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7608">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7609">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7609">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7610">BBAN 的余数 (1 到3个字母或数字) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7610">one to three letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7611">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7611">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7612">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7612">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7613">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7613">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7614">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7614">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7615">正则表达式 Regex_swift 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7615">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7616">找到 Keyword_swift 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7616">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="switzerland-ssn-ahv-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7650">瑞士 SSN AHV 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7650">Switzerland SSN AHV number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7651">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7651">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7652">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7652">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7653">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7653">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7654">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7654">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7655">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7655">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7656">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7656">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7657">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7657">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7658">13位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7658">13 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7659">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7659">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7660">13位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7660">13 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7661">三位数-756</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7661">three digits - 756</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7662">一个可选的点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7662">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7663">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7663">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7664">一个可选的点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7664">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7665">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7665">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7666">一个可选的点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7666">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7667">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7667">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7668">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7668">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7669">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7669">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7670">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7670">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7671">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7671">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7672">函数 Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7672">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7673">找到 Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7673">A keyword from Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7674">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7674">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7675">函数 Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7675">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Swiss SSN AHV Number -->
      <Entity id="277cfa4b-6eaa-4a1b-9492-099dec849971" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

numéro de sécurité sociale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7695">numéro de sécurité sociale</span></span>

   
## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7696">台湾国家标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7696">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7697">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7697">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7698">一个英文)  (，后跟9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7698">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7699">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7699">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7700">一个英文字母 (，后跟9个数字) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7700">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7701">一个英文字母 (，不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7701">one letter (in English, not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7702">数字 "1" 或 "2"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7702">the digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7703">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7703">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7704">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7704">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7705">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7705">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7706">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7706">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7707">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7707">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7708">函数 Func_taiwanese_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7708">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7709">找到 Keyword_taiwanese_national_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7709">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7710">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7710">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7711">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7711">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7712">函数 Func_taiwanese_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7712">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7713">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7713">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7730">台湾护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7730">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7731">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7731">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7732">生物识别护照号码：9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7732">biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7733">不带生物的护照号码：9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7733">non-biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7734">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7734">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7735">生物识别护照号码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7735">biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7736">字符 "3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7736">the character "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7737">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7737">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7738">不带生物的护照号码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7738">non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7739">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7739">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7740">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7740">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7741">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7741">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7742">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7742">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7743">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7743">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7744">正则表达式 Regex_taiwan_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7744">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7745">找到 Keyword_taiwan_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7745">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7746">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7746">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7747">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7747">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7748">ROC passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7748">ROC passport number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7749">Passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7749">Passport number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7750">Passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7750">Passport no</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7751">Passport Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7751">Passport Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7752">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7752">Passport #</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7753">护照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7753">护照</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7754">中華民國護照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7754">中華民國護照</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7755">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7755">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span></span>
   
## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7756">台湾居民证书 (ARC/TARC) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7756">Taiwan resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7757">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7757">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7758">10个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7758">ten letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7759">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7759">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7760">10个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7760">ten letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7761">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7761">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7762">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7762">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7763">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7763">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7764">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7764">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7765">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7765">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7766">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7766">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7767">正则表达式 Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7767">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7768">找到 Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7768">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7769">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7769">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7770">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7770">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7771">Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7771">Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7772">Resident Cert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7772">Resident Cert</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7773">Resident Cert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7773">Resident Cert.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7774">Identification card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7774">Identification card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7775">Alien Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7775">Alien Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7776">ARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7776">ARC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7777">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7777">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7778">TARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7778">TARC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7779">居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7779">居留證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7780">外僑居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7780">外僑居留證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7781">台灣地區居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7781">台灣地區居留證</span></span> 

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7782">泰语填充标识代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7782">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7783">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7783">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7784">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7784">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7785">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7785">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7786">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7786">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7787">第一个数字不是零或九</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7787">first digit is not zero  or nine</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7788">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7788">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7789">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7789">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7790">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7790">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7791">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7791">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7792">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7792">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7793">函数 Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7793">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7794">找到 Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7794">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7795">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7795">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7796">函数 Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7796">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_thai_citizen_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7798">Keyword_thai_citizen_Id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7798">Keyword_thai_citizen_Id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7799">ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7799">ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7800">标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7800">Identification Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7801">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7801">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7802">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7802">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7803">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7803">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7804">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7804">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
  
## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7805">土耳其国家标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7805">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7806">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7806">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7807">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7807">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7808">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7808">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7809">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7809">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7810">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7810">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7811">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7811">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7812">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7812">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7813">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7813">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7814">函数 Func_Turkish_National_Id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7814">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7815">找到 Keyword_Turkish_National_Id 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7815">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7816">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7816">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7817">函数 Func_Turkish_National_Id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7817">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7818">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7818">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7824">U.K.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7824">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7825">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7825">driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7826">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驱动程序的 "敏感信息类型" 中，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7826">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7827">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7827">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7828">特定格式的 18 个字母和数字组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7828">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7829">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7829">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7830">18 个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7830">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7831">5个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字 "9" 代替字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7831">five letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7832">一位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7832">one digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7833">日期格式 MMDDY 中的五个数字。出生日期 (第七个字符将增加50如果驱动程序是女，即51到62而不是01到 12) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7833">five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth (7th character is incremented by 50 if driver is female, i.e. 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7834">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字 "9" 代替一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7834">two letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7835">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7835">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7836">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7836">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7837">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7837">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7838">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7838">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7839">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7839">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7840">函数 Func_uk_drivers_license 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7840">The function Func_uk_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7841">找到 Keyword_uk_drivers_license 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7841">A keyword from Keyword_uk_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7842">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7842">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7852">motorcycles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7852">motorcycles</span></span>

## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7860">U.K.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7860">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7861">electoral 卷号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7861">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7862">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7862">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7863">两个字母后跟1-4 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7863">two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7864">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7864">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7865">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 后接1-4 个号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7865">two letters (not case sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7866">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7866">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7867">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7867">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7868">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7868">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7869">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7869">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7870">正则表达式 Regex_uk_electoral 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7870">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7871">找到 Keyword_uk_electoral 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7871">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7878">U.K.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7878">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7879">国家/地区运行状况服务号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7879">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7880">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7880">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7881">10-17 个数字，通过空格分隔 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7881">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7882">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7882">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7883">10-17 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7883">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7884">3个或10个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7884">either three or ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7885">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7885">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7886">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7886">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7887">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7887">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7888">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7888">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7889">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7889">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7890">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7890">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7891">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7891">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7892">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7892">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7893">函数 Func_uk_nhs_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7893">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7894">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7894">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7895">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7895">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7896">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7896">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7897">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7897">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7898">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7898">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7900">Keyword_uk_nhs_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7900">Keyword_uk_nhs_number</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7910">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7910">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7911">GP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7911">GP</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7912">DOB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7912">DOB</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7914">Date of Birth</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7914">Date of Birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7915">Birth Date</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7915">Birth Date</span></span> 
   
## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7916">U.K.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7916">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7917">国内保险号 (NINO) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7917">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7918">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家/地区 Identificaiton 号敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7918">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identificaiton Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7919">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7919">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7920">由空格或短划线分隔的七个字符或九个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7920">seven characters or nine characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7921">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7921">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7922">两种可能的模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7922">two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7923"> (有效 NINOs 的两个字母仅使用此前缀中的特定字符，此格式将对此进行验证;不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7923">two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7924">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7924">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7925">"A"、"B"、"C" 或 "d" (类似于前缀，后缀中只允许有某些字符;不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7925">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7926">OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7926">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7927">两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7927">two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7928">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7928">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7929">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7929">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7930">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7930">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7931">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7931">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7932">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7932">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7933">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7933">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7934">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7934">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7935">要么是 "A"、"B"、"C"，要么 ' d '</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7935">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7936">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7936">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7937">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7937">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7938">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7938">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7939">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7939">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7940">函数 Func_uk_nino 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7940">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7941">找到 Keyword_uk_nino 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7941">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7942">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7942">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7943">函数 Func_uk_nino 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7943">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7944">未找到 Keyword_uk_nino 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7944">No keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NINO -->
<Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-unique-taxpayer-reference-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7966">U.K.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7966">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7967">唯一的纳税人参考号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7967">Unique Taxpayer Reference Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7968">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7968">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7969">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7969">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7970">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7970">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7971">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7971">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7972">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7972">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7973">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7973">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7974">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7974">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7975">10个数字，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7975">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
 
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7976">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7976">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7977">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7977">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7978">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7978">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7979">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7979">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7980">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7980">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7981">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7981">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7982">函数  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7982">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-7983">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-7983">A keyword from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- U.K. Unique Taxpayer Reference Number -->
      <Entity id="ad4a8116-0db8-439a-b545-6d967642f0ec" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="us-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8003">美国银行帐户编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8003">U.S. bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8004">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8004">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8005">8-17 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8005">8-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8006">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8006">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8009">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8009">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8010">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8010">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8011">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8011">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8013">找到 Keyword_usa_Bank_Account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8013">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
