### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8044">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8044">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8045">取决于州</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8045">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8046">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8046">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8047">取决于状态-例如，纽约：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8047">depends on the state -- for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8048">与 ddd ddd ddd 相匹配的9个数字的格式将会匹配。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8048">nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8049">9个数字（如 ddddddddd）将不匹配。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8049">nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8050">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8050">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8051">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8051">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8052">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8052">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8053">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8053">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8054">函数 Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8054">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8055">找到 Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8055">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8056">找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8056">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8057">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8057">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8058">函数 Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8058">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8059">找到 Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8059">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8060">找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8060">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8061">未找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8061">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8159">美国单个纳税人标识号 (ITIN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8159">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8160">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8160">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8161">九个数字，以 "9" 开头，并包含 "7" 或 "8" 作为第四个数字，可以选择使用空格或短划线进行格式设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8161">nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8162">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8162">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8163">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8163">formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8164">数字 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8164">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8165">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8165">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8166">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8166">a space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8167">"7" 或 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8167">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8168">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8168">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8169">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8169">a space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8170">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8170">four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8171">纯</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8171">unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8172">数字 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8172">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8173">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8173">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8174">"7" 或 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8174">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8175">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8175">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8176">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8176">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8177">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8177">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8178">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8178">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8179">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8179">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8180">函数 Func_formatted_itin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8180">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8181">下列至少其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8181">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8182">找到 Keyword_itin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8182">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8183">函数 Func_us_address 找到正确日期格式的地址。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8183">The function Func_us_address finds an address in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8184">函数 Func_us_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8184">The function Func_us_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8185">找到 Keyword_itin_collaborative 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8185">A keyword from Keyword_itin_collaborative is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8186">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8186">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8187">函数 Func_unformatted_itin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8187">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8188">下列至少其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8188">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8189">找到 Keyword_itin_collaborative 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8189">A keyword from Keyword_itin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8190">函数 Func_us_address 找到正确日期格式的地址。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8190">The function Func_us_address finds an address in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8191">函数 Func_us_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8191">The function Func_us_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
<Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_address" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_date" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin_collaborative" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_address" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_date" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8206">许可证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8206">License</span></span>

## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8212"> (SSN) 的美国社会安全号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8212">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8213">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8213">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8214">9个数字，可以是格式化或无格式的模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8214">nine digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8215">如果在 2011 年中旬前发布，则 SSN 具有强格式，即数字的某部分必须介于某个有效的范围中（但是没有校验和）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8215">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8216">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8216">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8217">四个函数在四种不同的模式中查找 Ssn：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8217">four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8218">Func_ssn 查找具有 2011 年以前使用短划线或空格格式化的强格式的 SSN（ddd-dd-dddd 或 ddd dd dddd）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8218">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8219">Func_unformatted_ssn 查找具有 2011 年以前未格式化为 9 个连续数字的强格式的 SSN (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8219">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8220">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 查找 2011 年后使用短划线或空格（ddd-dd-dddd 或 ddd dd dddd）格式化的 SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8220">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8221">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 查找 2011 年后未格式化为 9 个连续数字 (ddddddddd) 的 SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8221">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8222">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8222">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8223">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8223">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8224">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8224">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8225">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8225">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8226">函数 Func_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8226">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8227">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8227">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8228">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8228">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8229">函数 Func_unformatted_ssn 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8229">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8230">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8230">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8231">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8231">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8232">函数 Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8232">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8233">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8233">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8234">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 55% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8234">A DLP policy is 55% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8235">函数 Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8235">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8236">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8236">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8237">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8237">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8238">Keyword_ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8238">Keyword_ssn</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8241">社会保障#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8241">social security #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8242">社会保障#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8242">social security#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8243">社会保障号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8243">social security no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8244">Social Security#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8244">Social Security#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8245">Soc Sec</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8245">Soc Sec</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8246">SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8246">SSN</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8247">SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8247">SSNS</span></span>

## <a name="us--uk-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8251">美国/英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8251">U.S. / U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8252">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8252">passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8253">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8253">The U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8254">护照号敏感信息类型实体在欧盟护照号敏感信息类型中可用，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8254">passport number sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8255">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8255">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8256">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8256">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8257">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8257">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8258">九个连续数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8258">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8259">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8259">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8260">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8260">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8261">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8261">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8262">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8262">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8263">函数 Func_usa_uk_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8263">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8264">找到 Keyword_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8264">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="178ec42a-18b4-47cc-85c7-d62c92fd67f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8265">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8265">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="ukraine-passport-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8285">乌克兰护照国内</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8285">Ukraine passport domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8286">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8286">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8287">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8287">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8288">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8288">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8289">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8289">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8290">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8290">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8291">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8291">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8292">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8292">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8293">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8293">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8294">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8294">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8295">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8295">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8296">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8296">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8297">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8297">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8298">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8298">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8299">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8299">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8300">正则表达式 Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8300">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8301">找到 Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8301">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport Domestic -->
      <Entity id="1817a540-221f-4459-9202-3bd78b81d803" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ukraine-passport-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8310">乌克兰护照（国际）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8310">Ukraine passport international</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8311">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8311">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8312">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8312">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8313">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8313">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8314">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8314">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8315">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8315">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8316">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8316">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8317">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8317">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8318">八个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8318">eight-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8319">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8319">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8320">八个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8320">eight-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8321">两个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8321">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8322">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8322">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8323">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8323">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8324">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8324">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8325">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8325">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8326">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8326">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8327">正则表达式 Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8327">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8328">找到 Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8328">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport International -->
      <Entity id="cfbe032d-22e0-4f28-ab68-d66e9641f1e2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="fa58a-8335">номер паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fa58a-8335">номер паспорта</span></span>
